Long ago, the swordgrass leaf quietly identified members of the Undead Legion. In the rotted forest rest the spirits of warriors past, their acceptance of and gratitude toward their guardians is expressed eloquently by the humble leaf.

Small silverwork doll depicting a young squire.

Listen carefully, and you can hear it say,

位于不死聚落地下水道里\n某扇格子门的钥匙。\n门的另一端通往湿漉的墓地。\n\:

囚禁小偷之辈的监牢钥匙。\n\n洛斯里克吸引不少有勇无谋的小偷，\n他们可能是从:

There is no shortage of brash thieves in Lothric, and these particular thieves likely scaled the wall from the Undead Settlement.

Key to the main entrance to the Grand Archives of Lothric.

Today, only a few of its keys remain. This one likely belonged to Gotthard, one of the king's Black Hands, who fled the castle.

Give to the blacksmith in the shrine to allow the use of gems for crystal, blessed, and dark infusion.

Remnants of the fire that burned down the Profaned Capital, preserved in an icy skull.

为了手持武器的圣职所出现的奇迹。\n\n能借由全身覆满白色防护膜，\n提升魔力属:
Miracle of clerics who wield weapons.

There was a short period in history where
clerics and sorcerers opposed one another.
Thus it became necessary for even simple clerics
to have some means of opposing magic.

arch enemy of Seath the Scaleless.
Havel despised magic, and was never complacent

法兰要塞的守卫铁面具。\n\n不死队的监视者们成为薪王以后，\n狼血就此断绝，法:
Iron mask of the watchdogs of Farron's Keep.

After the Legion's Watchers became Lords
of Cinder, the wolf blood dried up,
and Farron was consumed by a festering wood.

Within the wood, an emaciated old wolf commands watchdogs to defend the sanctity of sleeping warriors.

Both the exiles were surely watchdogs themselves, for Farron has always been a land of itinerants.

Crown of Wolnir, the Carthus conqueror.

Once upon a time, such things were bequeathed judiciously to each of the rightful lords, until Wolnir brought them to their knees, and ground their crowns to dust. Then the crowns became one, and Wolnir, the one High Lord.
卡萨斯的霸王沃尼尔王冠。: Crown of Wolnir, the Carthus conqueror.

过去不死竞技王者使用的武器。\n由宽剑身的剑与狮子盾\n组合而成的其中一组特殊成:
Weapon once wielded by the Champion of the Undead Match. A special paired set consisting of a broad sword and a lion shield.

The Champion fought on, without rest, until he lost his mind. In the end, only his page and a lone wolf stayed at his side.

one's very identity.

环印骑士的风帽。\n\n他们披上沁染于深渊的黑布，\n又特别在眼部盖上更多层的布:
The hood of the Ringed Knights.

These knights don Abyss-tainted black cloth,
with layer upon layer hiding their eyes.

This was nothing less than an attempt to reveal
that which the seal of fire has occluded,
a subtle defiance of the gods' wishes.

The armor of early men was forged in the Abyss,
and betrays a smidgen of life.

such armor, and those who possessed them.

从深渊泥沼涌出的白脸虫，\n其中空的头部。\n\n白脸虫原来是诱惑人类堕落黑暗的:
An empty head of a white-faced locust
that rose from an abyssal swamp.

The white-faced locusts were meant to beckon men to the dark with sermons, but most of them are unable to think past their own stomachs. Someone must rise to the occasion, and restore the path of righteousness.

Perhaps that someone is you? Did you not arise from the Abyss, and did you not resist drowning in the Age of Fire? Locusts and men are kindred spirits.
Why not don this head, and join them in likeness?

受古代王命，造访环印城的骑士团头盔。\n\n据说渴求黑暗灵魂的他们，\n在凄惨败:
Helm of the company of knights who were sent
to the Ringed City on an old king's orders.

The knights sought the dark soul, but were
so soundly crushed, they had little choice but
to swear themselves to the Judicator Giant.

The ill-fated company was later immortalized in
a dark fable, inspiring the aspect of certain
golems in whom their name lived on.

过去生息于堆土塔的沙之咒术师风帽。\n据说深红色的薄布带有魔力。\n\n沙之咒术:
Hood of the desert pyromancers,
who once walked the halls of the Earthen Peak.
It is said that the thin burgundy cloth
breathes with magic.

Desert pyromancers, most of them female,
were known for their great fans of flame,
and enchanting looks.

But what is enchanting can also be deadly,
especially when clothed in such alluring garb.

过去诱惑流浪骑士亚瓦，\n随后与他携手合作，共度生涯的魔女佳丽，\n其穿戴的紫色:
The purple hat of the witch Zullie,
who intended to seduce Alva the Wayfarer,
but eventually became his closest supporter, spending her entire life with him.

The pointed hat is a symbol of heretical magical crafts, and Zullie wore hers with an unspoken, but deep sense of pride.

Small cracks allow the wearer to see.

but the similarity is purely cosmetic.

看起来与防火女的头冠有点相仿，: resemblance to the Fire Keeper's crown,

带有绿锈的嫩芽装饰。\n嫩芽为费莲诺尔公主的图纹。\n\n装备后将成为“教堂之枪:
A green-rusted ornament of young grass, the crest of Princess Filianore.
Equip to join the Spears of the Church covenant.

The Spears of the Church watch over the Princess' slumber, and when the church is compromised by a trespasser, the Judicator summons them as loyal spirits to eliminate the threat (summoned automatically while this is equipped).

Loyal spirits summoned as Spears of the Church are granted a blessing of protection.
哦，愚蠢之众啊，是否终将发觉，: Ahh, you ignorant slaves. Finally taken notice, have you?
吾之爱子欧赛罗特──龙之子的力量。: Of the power of my beloved Ocelotte, child of dragons.
然则不成。: Well, I will not give him up.
吾子即为吾之一切。: For he is all that I have.
王兄为吾──洛斯里克王子之剑，: My brother, unyielding sword of Lothric's Prince.
欢迎汝，无火的余灰、调度薪火之人啊。: Welcome, Unkindled one, purloiner of cinders.
吾是成不了王的。: Mind you, the mantle of lord interests me none.
不论是传火的使命，亦或是血统传承，早足以生厌。: The fire-linking curse, the legacy of lords, let it all fade into nothing.
因而吾成不了王，且不论何者，皆不可成。: Ill-starred are they who take the throne. I shall not stand among them.
……为此，汝当好好歇息。: You've done quite enough, now have your rest.
洛斯里克王子之剑，将赐予汝安息。: The royal sword of Lothric shall grant you peace.
嘿嘿，贪心的家伙，瞧瞧你那德性。: Shame on you, you greedy guts.
嘿嘿，贪心的女人，瞧瞧你那德性。: Shame on you, you insatiable wench.
嘿嘿，烂秃驴，瞧瞧你那德性。: Shame on you, you rotten cleric.
嘿嘿，烂尼姑，瞧瞧你那德性。: Shame on you, you rotten nun.
所有人一看到洋葱，都以为他少根筋啊。: Thought you could outwit an onion?
祝你和巨人玩得开心啊！再见──: Well, say hello to the nice giant! He adores visitors.
火终黯淡，正待最后的王者现身。: The fire fades, and awaits its one last Lord.
救救王子，救救洛斯里克大人吧……: Prince Lothric is in your hands...
卡塔利纳骑士杰克巴尔多，前来履行承诺了。: I, Siegward of the Knights of Catarina, have come to uphold my promise!
愿薪王与太阳同在。: Let the sun shine upon this Lord of Cinder.
对传承初始之火的古代神明们挥下手中的剑。: To the old gods of Lordran, deliverers of the First Flame.
……然而总有一天，黑暗之中一定会出现一簇小小的火团，: But one day, tiny flames will dance across the darkness.
就是那王者们传承的余火。: Like embers, linked by lords past.
灰烬大人啊，您还听得见我的声音吗？: Ashen one, hearest thou my voice, still?
灰烬大人，这一切……都是谎言吗？: Ashen one, was it all a lie?
是历代传火薪王们的故乡，也是漂泊汇流之地。: where the transitory lands of the Lords of Cinder converge.
并且了解了预言的含意──: the pilgrims discover the truth of the old words.
当传承火焰熄灭之时，钟声将响彻四周，: When the link of fire is threatened, the bell tolls,
进而唤醒棺木中的古老薪王们。: unearthing the old Lords of Cinder from their graves.
深渊的监视者们──法兰的不死队，: Farron's Undead Legion, the Abyss Watchers.
以及罪业之都的孤独王者──: And the reclusive lord of the Profaned Capital,
王者们一定会舍弃王位吧，: The Lords will abandon their thrones,
那是无名、成不了薪，且被诅咒的不死人，: Nameless, accursed Undead, unfit even to be cinder.
欢迎来到营火，无火的余灰大人。: Welcome to the bonfire, Unkindled One.
专门维护营火，以及服侍您的人。: I tend to the flame, and tend to thee.
若您为了找回舍弃王位的王者们而需要帮助，: The Lords have left their thrones, and must be deliver'd to them.
就请您使唤我吧。: To this end, I am at thy side.
请您触碰我内在的黑暗吧。: Then touch the darkness within me.
那无主的灵魂，将会归化成您的力量。: Take nourishment from these sovereignless souls.
那因火而分化出的力量，已是无主之魂啊，:
Let these souls, withdrawn from their vessels,
manifestations of disparity, elucidated by fire...
回归吧，回归至我内在深处，连火也无法触及的真正黑暗之中。:
...burrow deep within me,
retreating to a darkness beyond the reach of flame.
再以灰烬作器，成就新主：化作他的影、雕化他的影。:
Let them assume a new master, inhabiting ash,
casting themselves upon new forms.
因火黯去而遭弑的王啊、因火黯去而现身的王啊。: An Unkindled slayer of lords; a Lord himself Unkindled.
灰烬大人，无火者为灵魂的器皿。: Ashen one, to be unkindled is to be a vessel for souls.
因此您可以将无主的灵魂化为自己的力量，: Sovereignless souls will become thy strength.
灰烬大人，请您将无主的灵魂带过来吧……: Ashen one, bring me souls, plucked from their vessels...
灰烬大人，希望您能告诉我，: Ashen one, may I pose thee a question?
王位上的王——矮小的鲁道斯大人，他是否跟您说过些什么？: Has the little Lord Ludleth spoken to thee of any...curious matters?
……那位大人，一定都明白：: I sense that he possesseth some knowledge...
防火女到底失去了什么，而那又是多么重要，或是多么可怕的事物。: Of a thing once most precious, or most terrible, now lost to the Fire Keepers.
我该去探究这件事吗？: Pray tell, is it a matter of which I should be apprised?
……灰烬大人，非常感谢您带来的眼眸。: Ashen one, my thanks for the eyes thou'st given.
但是对防火女而言，保有眼眸是个禁忌。: But Fire Keepers are not meant to have eyes. It is forbidden.
若是给予我微弱的光，我就会看见那可怖的背叛──: These will reveal, through a sliver of light, frightful images of betrayal.
灰烬大人啊，这是您所冀望的吗？: Ashen one, is this truly thy wish?
我是您的防火女，会遵从您的指示。: I serve thee, and will do as thou bid'st.
这件事情就请您深埋心中吧，请不要让任何人知道。: This will be our private affair. No one else may know of this.
您为了寻找传火王者们奔走，而我只是个无眼的防火女，: Stay thy path, find lords to link the fire, and I will blindly tend to the flame.
这层认知就等到您背叛一切的那一刻为止。: Until the day of thy grand betrayal.
灰烬大人，若您改变心意，: Ashen one, if thine heart should bend...
就请您杀了我，夺去这对眼眸吧。: ...kill me, and strip these eyes from my person.
如此一来，我就仍是原本的防火女，: I will return as the Fire Keeper I once was.
那么就请您杀了我，夺去这对眼眸吧。: Please, kill me, and take these eyes away.
否则，我一定──: Before I am drawn into the darkness.
会被那微弱的光，还有可怖的背叛吸引。: Seduced by the thin light, and the awful betrayal...
灰烬大人，请您杀了我，夺去这对眼眸吧。: Ashen one, kill me, and take these eyes away.
五位王已全部回到王位上了。: The five lords sit their five thrones.
全都是您的功劳，而这也正是为王之证。: All thanks to thee, most worthy of lords.
灰烬大人，请对薪王面前，那营火中的螺旋剑行跪地礼。: Ashen one, with the Lords as thy witness, bend thy knee afore the bonfire's coiled sword.
这个仪式是为了让您继承他们的余火，: And let the Lords' embers acknowledge thee as their true heir.
也是为了让您成为真正的传火之王。: A true lord, fit to link the fire.
灰烬大人，若我的话说得不得体，请您见谅。: Ashen one, forgive me if this soundeth strange.
那眼眸映照出的绝火世界，存在着无尽黑暗: The eyes show a world without fire, a vast stretch of darkness.
……但是，那与无眼的我们所感受到的并不相同。: But 'tis different to what is seen when stripped of vision.
我看得见在遥远的前方，有一簇小小的火团，: In the far distance, I sense the presence of tiny flames.
而那就像是王者们传承的火──就像是余火一样。: Like precious embers, left to us by past Lords, linkers of the fire.
可能因为如此，那黑暗才会如此地吸引我吧？: Could this be what draws me to this strangely enticing darkness?
为了薪王们、诸位灰烬大人们，以及所有被传火束缚住的人们，:
For the Lords of Cinder, for the ashen prisoners,
for all those held to preserve the fire.
灰烬大人，愿火焰将您引导。: Ashen one, may the flames guide thee.
灰烬大人，假使初始之火已近在您的眼前，: Ashen one, if, when thou peerest upon the First Flame...
但是您依旧希望终结传火，倾心绝火的世界，: ...Thou wishest yet, for a world without fire, for an end to the linking of the fire...
我身为防火女，看守火到最后一刻是我的责任。: I am a Fire Keeper, and I tend to the flame, to the very end.
……您授予我的眼眸也是如此表示。: Thou'st given me eyes, and such it was they shewed me.
我还不能死去。: But, know'st thou not? I cannot die.
所以灰烬大人，请让我服侍您。: So please, ashen one, allow me to serve thee.
为了找回舍弃王位的王者们，: The Lords have left their thrones, and must be delivered to them.
请您使唤我吧。: To this end, I am ever at thy side.
请向营火展示螺旋剑吧。: Produce the coiled sword at the bonfire.
那把剑是灰烬之证，而它会引导您前往王者之地──: The mark of ash will guide thee to the land of the Lords.
洛斯里克，王者的故乡及漂泊汇流之地。: To Lothric, where the homes of the Lords converge.
谢谢您，灰烬大人。: How gracious of thee, ashen one.
这肯定就是防火女失去的东西吧……: The very things we Fire Keepers have been missing...
正因为如此，才会把她寄托在我身上。: Then let it find its own place, within my bosom.
她一定不会抗拒吧，因为我们都是防火女。: She will understand. We are both Fire Keepers, after all.
愿火焰会引导你。: May the flames guide thy way.
哦，你就是无火的余灰、探王者，对吧？: Oh, thou'rt unkindled, and a seeker of Lords.
说来你或许不信……我是曾经传过火的薪王，: Look not in bewilderment as I say...I linked the fire long ago, becoming a Lord of Cinder.
而这还在承受微火燃烧的身体就是铁证。: If substantiation be thy want, set thine eyes upon my charred corse.
这残败的身体，靠近点瞧，应该能看得很清楚吧？: This sad cadav'r. No need to be coy, have a closer look.
……哦，毋须担心，我不会离开此处，: Fret not, fret not, my feet are here firmly planted.
因为我是王，而此处是我的王位。: For I am a Lord, and this is my throne.
……哦，是你啊。抱歉，我好像睡着了。: Ahh, beg pardon. I must have dozed a while.
但你毋须担心，我不会离开此处，: Fret not, fret not, my feet are here firmly planted.
哦，你回来了，做得很好。: Ah-hah, thou'rt returned. And a fine day it is.
那么，畸形的灵魂带来了吗？: So, happened upon any twisted souls?
哦，看来你把所有的王都找齐了啊。: Ahh, well met. All is as planned, is it not?
感谢你，猎王的英雄啊，这全都是你的丰功伟业。: Glory be, my Lord-slaying Champion. It is all thy doing.
如此一来，我也终于能完成身为王的责任。: The stage is set for me to play my part as Lord, too.
去吧，快到那位防火女身边去吧。: Go. Speak with the Fire Keeper.
哦，要给我回来啊。: Now, now, do not be away overlong.
五座王位上有五位薪王──这都是为了传火啊。: Five thrones will take five Lords, as kindling for the linking of the fire.
现在火终于要熄灭：为了传承即逝的火、为了再次将世界延续下去、: The fast-fading flame must be linked, to preserve this world.
为了重现最古老的传火: A re-enactment of the first linking of the fire.
……因此，我成为了薪王。: So it is I became a Lord of Cinder.
我这矮子正沐浴在为王的荣光下啊。: I may be but small, but I will die a colossus.
哦，我就和你说一说吧。: Listen, this might pique thine interest.
在我成为薪王以前，我是研究“炼成”的人。: Before I was a Lord of Cinder, I was a student of transposition.
就是将灵魂的特质凝固后取出……: The process of extracting, and coalescing, the essence of a soul.
这可是史上有损库尔兰之名的禁忌喔。: A forbidden art, that once left a foul stain upon Courland's honour.
……不过那的确是能让人得到难得力量的技术。: Tis an art that grants powers once thought unattainable.
大部分的冶炼炉是在库尔兰消失了……但这里，是俗称的诅咒汇流之地。: Most transposing kilns were lost with Courland, but this place is a crossing for all manner of cursed objects.
你如果在哪处找到了冶炼炉，带过来给我吧。: If thou happen'st 'pon a transposing kiln, bring it to me, quick.
嗯，你是位很杰出的探王者，我是不是该叫你猎王者呢？: Ahh, most illustrious Lordseeker. Or should I say, Lord-slayer?
每位王都拥有匹配的灵魂，你看看王位底下的薪就会懂了。: Fine kindling for the thrones, is it not, each soul truly worthy of Lordship.
而你却把他们都杀了。不过他们一死，才能被束缚在王位上啊。: And all slain by thy hand. To bind them to their thrones, even in death.
……哦，我不会怪你。就像我们必须待在王位上，而那也是你的使命。: Oh, I have no qualms. For as we are to our thrones, thou art to thy duty.
你只是为了肃正王道而已。: In fact, methinks thou'st helped these poor Lords along their rightful path.
……哦，你找到冶炼炉了。: Oh, belike it is...a transposing kiln in thy possession.
看起来相当老旧了，不过好像还可以使用。: Seen better days, but, methinks it shall suffice.
……喂，你要记得把畸形的灵魂拿来啊。: Now, bring to me a twisted soul.
“炼成”就是把灵魂的特质凝固后取出的技术，: Transposition is the art of extracting, and coalescing, the essence of a soul.
只要用畸形的灵魂炼成，就能得到其相应的力量。: In transposing a twisted soul, its true power transferreth to thee.
……你就去找王，再把他们杀了吧。反正早就无所顾忌了吧？: Thy purpose is to seek Lords, and slay them. What's to fear in a little transposition, now?
……看啊，各位，我成为了王……: See ye not? I am a Lord...
……就算火很微弱，还是能延续世界啊……: A wee flame, belike, but I shoulder the world...
……不要一直怪我了……: I am not to blame, I'm not...
……啊啊，好烫，骨头在燃烧，好痛苦……: Ahh, it singeth, to the bone, it hurts...
……救救我，杀了我吧……: Please, help me. Be done with me...
……不要、不要，这样太痛苦了啊……: No, gods, no, I cannot bear it...
猎王者啊，完成你的使命吧……: Lord-slayer, do not fail us now...
那你应该也找到深色眼眸了，对吧？: And the black eyes that shimmer within, I see?
……往事令人怀念啊。: Tis as if it were but yesterday.
那时候她还没成为防火女，我也还没成为薪王，: We did all we could to spare her from them.
我能炼成她的灵魂，而这同时能向那位防火女轻喃：: Of what the thin light of these eyes might reveal, to the eyeless Fire Keeper.
那是身为无眸的她，决不能看见的: Scenes of betrayal, things never intended for her ken, visions of...
……哦，你……拿着一个奇妙的东西啊……: Well well, what peculiar things thou keep'st on thy person...
我有印象，一定是那对深色眼眸吧？: Those I have seen before. Black eyes, if I am not mistaken?
……哦，是你啊，等你很久了。: Ahh, well met. Thou'rt at last returned.
你知道亚斯特拉的安里吧？: Knowest thou the name, Anri of Astora?
那个女骑士，说这是给你的谢礼。: The brave girl left this, as thanks.
那个男骑士，说这是给你的谢礼。: The brave lad left this, as thanks.
那么，你把畸形的灵魂带来了吗？: So. Happened upon any twisted souls?
也就是说，我们是最后垫底了吗……: To think others might ne'er be raised...
“最后的王”的称呼，对矮子来说过奖了啊。: And I, of the Last Lords, a rather little lord, most undeserving of the honour.
……一直在等你啊。: ...She hath waited a long time indeed...
对了，希望你不要看轻防火女啊。: Treat the Fire Keeper not with discourtesy.
她其实和你没两样，都是被传火给束缚住了。: She is much like thee. Prisoners, both, kept to link the fire.
我是按照自己的意愿成为薪王，也深深以此为荣。: I took the mantle of Lord of Cinder of mine own volition. I speak these words with pride.
你也要按照自己的意愿做选择: Choose thy fate alone. Seize it with thine own hands.
……如果那会造成过分的背叛，更该如此啊。: All the more, should thy fate entail such foul betrayal...
对了，给你一个来自矮子的忠告。: Now, heed this little warning, from this little lord.
那行动是为了完成使命，也就是说，下场如何早就心里有底。: She knoweth her fate. What will become of her upon her duty's end.
应该不希望你追上去吧。: She would not wish thee follow her.
那对眼眸会映照出终结传火后，黑暗无止境延续下去的世界。: The eyes shew a world destitute of fire, a barren plane of endless darkness.
为什么我会当上王、传火？就是为了防止那种世界诞生。: So I will'd myself Lord, to link the fire, to paint a new vision.
……哦，你拿着很扭曲的剑啊。: Ahh, thou'st two most peculiar swords discover'd.
那是成对的剑，必须要有两把才完整，是它原有的诅咒。: A curse once bound them together, such that they served as one.
冶炼炉能够显现它的真面目吧。: A transposing kiln should restore their rightful form.
……但是，你要仔细考虑，: But before thou should'st act, think well upon the matter.
他们可是好不容易分开了啊。: As thou knowest, they are but newly rent apart.
我是隆道尔的尤莉雅，是尤艾尔的朋友。: I am Yuria of Londor, a close friend of his.
……你拯救了他的灵魂啊。: Thanks to thee, Yoel's soul is redeem'd.
谢谢你。我以朋友的身份向你道谢。: Allow me to express my gratitude, in his stead.
你已经是王了吧？: Thou'rt a Lord, art thou not?
承受黑暗印记的刻印──我辈的游魂之王啊。: Bearer of the dark sigil, and our Lord of Hollows.
王啊，只要你仍是游魂之王，我们隆道尔全体上下就将全心服从你。: For the time thou remain'st our Lord, we of Londor shall serve thee.
当然，我也属于你……: And I, of course, am also thine.
啊，是你，我辈之王啊。: Ahh, our Lord and rightful Liege.
有什么事情就找我尤莉雅，尽管吩咐。: Speak freely, Thy Lordship. I am at thy beck and call.
你想去传火地了，对吧？: Away to link the fire, I presume?
没有什么好怕的，黑暗印记会引导你。: Think not on thy fears. The dark sigil will guide thee.
……去传火吧，我辈的游魂之王啊。: Link the fire, our Lord of Hollows.
你打算去传火地了，没错吧？: Thine heart is fix'd upon the linking of the fire.
篡位者啊，拜托你，请去夺火吧。: But brave usurper, I prithee, wrest the flame from its mantle.
夺来那股力量，力量落入我辈游魂，进而恢复人类应有的姿态吧。: So that we Hollows, in most honest shape of man, may have it for our own.
黑暗印记将引导你。: May the dark sigil guide thee.
敬请平安，我辈之王啊。: Be safe, our Lord and Liege.
请你夺火吧。: I prithee wrest the flame from its mantle.
啊，是有件事想和你说。: Oh, good Hollow. I'm afraid I must say...
……彼海姆的欧贝克，此人别有心机。: Orbeck of Vinheim is a cause of much consternation.
身为游魂，却盘算当上游魂之王。: He proclaimeth himself Lord of Hollows.
若现在放他一马，他未来可能会成为你的敌人吧。: If left alone, he may one day imperil thy rule.
……不想这样的话，你就手刃他吧。: Fall to this matter yarely, else we are unraveled.
这也是你为王的证明吧……: Decisiveness is the mark of a true monarch...
你认识名叫安里的女性吗？: Knowest thou of a maid named Anri?
你认识名叫安里的男性吗？: Knowest thou of a youth named Anri?
那人是游魂，也将是你的伴侣。: She is Hollow, and will join thee in wedlock.
现在是我的朋友在教导她，等时候到了，就去迎接她吧。: A fellow of mine guides her at this moment. When the time is ripe, thou mayst make thy salutations.
现在是我的朋友在教导他，等时候到了，就去迎接他吧。: A fellow of mine guides him at this moment. When the time is ripe, thou mayst make thy salutations.
毕竟你是王啊，是该要有位相符的伴侣吧？: For what Lord taketh no spouse?
是好消息，看来你的伴侣已经准备好了: Good tidings. Thy spouse is ready.
……你可以去接人了。: The time is ripe to greet her.
她人就在那个亚诺尔隆德，隐藏的暗月厅里等你。: The girl awaits thee, in the hidden darkmoon chamber of Anor Londo.
他人就在那个亚诺尔隆德，隐藏的暗月厅里等你。: The boy awaits thee, in the hidden darkmoon chamber of Anor Londo.
一切都是为了让你成为真正的王。: So thou mayst a true monarch become.
哦，你已经亲自处理完欧贝克了。: Ahh, I see Orbeck's claim is proven false.
做得非常好，不愧是我辈之王。: As it should be, our right and deserving Lord of Hollows.
这是隆道尔的宝藏，是与王者身份相符的饰品。: It is a Londor treasure, befitting of a true Lord.
……我辈的游魂之王啊，黑暗印记将引导你。: Lord of Hollows, may the dark sigil guide thy way.
婚礼顺利结束了吧？: I presume thy holy vows are sworn?
做得非常好，这么一来，你就是名正言顺的我辈之王──: Wonderful. Now thou'rt the true and deserving Lord of Hollows.
既有了伴侣，又拥有足以夺火的篡位者力量。: With a spouse, the strength to claim the fire is thine.
……王啊，请去夺火。: Thy Lordship, I prithee wrest the fire from its mantle.
我们隆道尔、我尤莉雅，所作一切都是为了王。: I, Yuria, and all Londor, embrace thy impending Lordship.
那么，就连交谈都是多余的。: There is naught more to say.
哼，尤艾尔看走眼了啊。: Hmph, Yoel knows not of thy folly.
竟然失去神智，变成游魂。: A Hollow need not be mad.
我辈之王居然是如此俗人！: No one so weak shall ever rule us!
这就是所谓神的枷锁吗……: So, these are the shackles of the gods...
……起码俗人还能当做柴薪燃烧……: Peasant, at least thy cadavder shall a little kindling make...
王啊，你是怎么了？: Thy Lordship, what is the matter?
篡位者啊，请夺火吧……: Brave usurper, I beseech thee claim the fire...
就在传火的当下，请您夺火吧。: When the moment cometh to link the fire, wrest it from its mantle.
……所谓火的时代，指的是从古老神明延续而来的时代，而传火就是时代的传承。: The Age of Fire was founded by the old gods, sustained by the linking of the fire.
不过既然神已不见踪影，火的力量也该转移了吧: But the gods are no more, and the all-powerful fire deserveth a new heir.
……该转移到人类应有的姿态──我辈的游魂之王身上了。: Our Lord of Hollows, it shall be, who weareth the true face of mankind.
拜托，让我死吧，让我解脱吧……: Please, grant me death. Undo my shackles.
……您是灰烬英雄大人吧。: A Champion of Ash, as I live and breathe.
能一睹尊容，实属荣幸。: To be in your presence is a great honour.
我是隆道尔的尤艾尔，如你所见，是个巡礼者。: I am Yoel of Londor, a pilgrim, as you can see, only...
看来就只剩下我一个人侥幸活命。: Somehow, I've failed to die as was ordained.
……但这可能也是我的命运。: Well, perhaps my calling lies elsewhere.
灰烬大人，您有意让我当您的随从吗？: Say, Champion of Ash, how does the idea of taking me into your service strike you?
我原本是魔法师，我想多少可以帮上您的忙。: I was once a sorcerer. Surely I can be of use.
您给予了我这侥幸活命的人最后的义务……: I should be dead, yet you have granted me purpose anew.
我隆道尔的尤艾尔，决意成为您的随从。: I, Yoel of Londor, do solemnly swear myself to you.
身为被诅咒的巡礼者，根本不配成为您的随从。: An accursed pilgrim has no place in your honourable service.
不过，灰烬大人啊，当侥幸活命的巡礼者遇见了英雄大人后，: But if a lost soul should encounter a legend such as you,
我不禁思考，这一定是命运。: could that be anything but a movement of fate?
……所以，我会一直待在这里，: I will remain in this spot.
说不定您会回心转意啊。: Praying solemnly that you might have a change of heart.
噢噢，灰烬大人，您改变心意了吗？: Ahh, Champion of Ash. Have you had a change of heart?
拜托您，让我当您的随从吧。: I beg of you, take me into your service.
杀了不死人值得骄傲吗？被诅咒的英雄啊。: Killing Undead for sport, accursed champion?
这还真的是……值得庆贺啊……: And a fool's sport it is...
噢噢，灰烬大人，您回来了啊。: Oh, our Champion of Ash, welcome home.
我这侥幸活命的巡礼者，居然能看见那般神秘的火焰，: This pilgrim, with a debt in death, hardly deserves to behold this divine flame.
若不是成为您的随从，这件事根本不可能实现。: And I never would have, had you not taken me into your service.
非常感谢您……我再次重申，请让我奉侍您。: I thank you dearly for this... And assure you of my leal service.
有什么事情，请尽管吩咐。: By all means, tell me what you desire.
不肖随从尤艾尔，任您吩咐。: I would do anything for my master, just say the word.
就如同我先前所说，我原本是魔法师。: As I have said, I was once a sorcerer.
虽说隆道尔的法术比不上声名远播的彼海姆，: Alas, the magic of Londor is a far cry from the wonders of Vinheim.
但只要是我知道的法术，绝对倾囊相授。: But I can teach you what I know.
我能够将您真正的力量牵引而出。: I believe that I can help tease out your true strength.
这一点隆道尔的巡礼者早已了然于心：: We pilgrims of Londor are keenly aware.
身上有黑暗之环烙印的人，都拥有暗藏的力量……: That those branded by the Darksign possess something quite special...
受到黑暗之环烙印的人啊，引出您真正的力量……: Bearer of the Darksign, let your true strength shine...
噢噢，您已经得到十足的力量了。: Ahh, you have attained ample strength.
看来见真章的时候近了，我辈之王啊……: All will soon be clear, my good Lord...
……灰烬大人，为什么……这么做……: Champion of ash, what have you done?
吾名幽儿希卡，正是暗月骑士团之长。: I am Yorshka. Captain of the Darkmoon Knights.
而汝为何驻足于此？: What beckoned thee to such a place?
……言下之意，吾已明了。虽已是无人的骑士团，吾仍为其之长，: Very well. Captain to this knightless company, I remain.
……来此听吾言，诚难能可贵。: Thou'st journeyed far; hear my voice.
汝若有决心化为暗月之誓约者，以讨逆神贼敌，: If thou shalt swear by the Covenant, to become
成为吾等之父葛温、吾等之姊葛维艾薇雅之影。: A shadow of Father Gwyn and Sister Gwynevere,
化身征讨逆神贼敌的剑，: A blade that shall hunt the foes of our Lords;
吾当守护汝，并以黯影太阳、暗月之力助汝克敌。: Then I place thee under the aegis, and the power, of the Darkmoon.
……汝自此便已成暗月之剑，: Thou'rt now a Blade of the Darkmoon.
为暗月骑士团独一无二的正式骑士。: The only knight of our company.
汝须尽骑士之责，且藉此纹章铭记于心。: Swear this oath, and face thy solemn duty.
……汝若误入此处，则毋须停驻。: If thou'st come stumbling here in error, I bid thee leave anon.
此处为俘虏之塔，汝停留于此，必定引起僭越者沙力万不快。: This tower is a prison. Thy presence shall invoke the ire of the tyrant, Sulyvahn.
……吾已许久不闻人声，奇妙之人呀，在此言谢。: Though 'twas a rare delight to converse with another. My thanks, strange visitor.
愿汝时有暗月恩惠随之。: May the Darkmoon watch over thee.
然此处为俘虏之塔，汝停留于此，必定引起僭越者沙力万不快。: This tower is a prison. Thy presence shall invoke the ire of the tyrant, Sulyvahn.
啊，暗月之剑啊，欢迎回来。: Oh, good Blade of the Darkmoon, welcome home.
若吾力之所逮，出口要求便可。: If I can provide thee succour, only tell me how.
过去吾等之父葛温，心忧火已黯淡，于是投身成为薪王。: Long ago, our father Gwyn, lamenting the waning of the fire, became cinder of his own will.
往后众多的人之子，即英雄们，接续传承火焰。: Now, the fire is linked by the champions who have come in his stead.
此为吾父、神之遗志，因此暗月为守护传火之人，将化身为剑。: Such is the will of father, and the gods. And so the Darkmoon knights took arms, to watch over those who link the fire.
……然在久远以前，骑士团丧失了正式骑士，: But long ago, our company lost its last proper knight.
徒留誓约，而后汝现身于此……: Only its covenant was preserved, to this day, until the time of thy visit.
……汝可否回答？: May I pose thee a question?
此处为俘虏之塔，高耸孤立，且往来机关无法动弹，理该无法可至。: This tower, this prison, stands tall and solitary, the contraption bridging its lower reaches long unmoving.
而为何，汝却能前来此处？: So...by what path didst thou here ascend?
难道汝能飞翔于空？: Art thou a creature of the air, or other winged thing?
哎！果真如此啊。: Oh, my! I imagined it might be so.
则汝应为龙，亦或是乌鸦之辈？: Then thou'rt a dragon, or perhaps a crow?
啊，不论如何，汝真是使人心生怀念且奇妙啊。: Well, whatever thou beest, thou'rt wondrous strange, yet strangely familiar, visitor.
是吾失言，请勿怪罪。: Forgive my prying. Think no more on mine asking.
说来也是耻辱，吾是井底之蛙啊……: I am ashamed to say, I know very little, of anything...
暗月实则吾之兄长──黯影太阳葛温德林的骑士团。: The Darkmoon Knights were once led by my elder brother, the Dark Sun Gwyndolin.
然兄长因病倒下，因此由吾继承。: But he was stricken by illness, and leadership of the knights fell to me.
而后，吾遭沙力万夺取教宗地位，落得阶下囚。: Then Sulyvahn wrongfully proclaimed himself Pontiff, and took me prisoner.
……现今兄长究竟身在何处？: Oh where could my dear brother be?
望能有天再见，介绍汝于兄长，: If only he were here, I would be most pleased for ye both to meet.
却比以前更形细瘦，也遭到侵蚀……: How it has thinned and withered...
啊，感谢汝，兄长一定是为汝所救。: Oh, my thanks. I'm certain thou'st given my brother peace.
虽不成敬意，收下此戒指吧。: It is not much, but take this ring.
虽不成敬意，请汝收下。: It is not much, but please take this.
并非以骑士团之长身份，而是黯影太阳葛温德林之妹，向汝致上谢意。: As my thanks, not as a captain, but as sister to the Dark Sun Gwyndolin.
……而吾也因此能在最后，触碰到兄长。: ...Thou'st granted me my brother's touch, one last time...
此人为危险男子……: This man is a grave threat...
此人为危险女子……: This woman is a grave threat...
暗月之剑，诚成绩斐然。: My Blade of the Darkmoon, thy deeds merit great worship.
为贡献卓越之骑士赐赏，乃团长之责。: As Captain, 'tis my duty to honour knights of great accomplishment.
吾为此从兄长承继暗月之秘密仪式，: This is a wonder of the Darkmoon, inherited from my brother for this very purpose.
敬请接受，此为与汝名分相符之物。: Please, it is thine, and not lightly given.
汝此后仍续为吾等之父葛温、吾等之姊葛维艾薇雅之影，: As a shade of Father Gwyn and Sister Gwynevere,
化身征讨逆神贼敌的剑，且尽骑士之责。: Persevere in thy knightly duty, hunting down the gods' would-be foes.
骑士团之长，吾幽儿希卡，将赐赏于汝。: I, Yorshka, captain of this company, hereby recognise thy service.
……望能有天以骑士团之长身份，向兄长好好夸耀，有位不可多得的好骑士加入吾等。: ...I would speak to my brother of this, one day. Of the shining new hope that joined our dear company.
而理所当然，指的是汝。: I speak of thee, of course.
……哦，你也是死不成的家伙啊。: Ahhh, another one, roused from the sleep of death?
我和你是同类。无火的余灰一事无成，而且还是连死都死不成的半吊子。: Well, you're not alone. We Unkindled are worthless. Can't even die right.
一群死不成的家伙居然要去找薪王，还想把王带回到发霉的王位上，: And they'd have us seek the Lords of Cinder, and return them to their moulding thrones.
那群人都是传火的英雄大人啊！我们这种货色怎么可能办得到？: But we're talking true legends with the mettle to link the fire. We're not fit to lick their boots.
像我们这种人居然要去找薪王，还想把王带回到发霉的王位上，: Asking us to seek the Lords of Cinder, and return them to their moulding thrones.
……哦，看样子你成功脱身啦。: Oooh, yet to give in, eh?
很好啊，这下子那个防火女一定会很高兴吧。: Good. The Fire Keeper must be twitching with delight.
……不过，你知道那些被称作英雄大人的薪王们的真面目吗？: But what do you really know about these Lords of Cinder, these supposed legends?
以前还是个圣职，但是却一直吃人，真令人作呕。: A right and proper cleric, only, he developed a habit of devouring men.
不只肥得像只溺水猪，还变成四处乱流的烂泥巴，最后被幽禁在幽邃教堂。: He ate so many that he bloated like a drowned pig, then softened into sludge, so they stuck him in the Cathedral of the Deep.
……但艾尔德利奇却成为薪王。这和个人品行无关，只是单看力量强弱而已。: And they made him a Lord of Cinder. Not for virtue, but for might.
这就是王，你还打算要挑战吗？: Such is a lord, I suppose. But here I ask. Do we have a sodding chance?
……在洛斯里克城外，不死镇的塔的下层，听说现在还有路可以走。: At the foot of Lothric Castle, an old path still runs below the tower in the Undead Settlement.
那是运送牺牲品到幽邃教堂的活祭品之路，你就沿着路走吧。: It was used to transport sacrifices to the Cathedral of the Deep. You should see where it leads.
……你是认真的吗？真是不知天高地厚的笨蛋。: You haven't given up yet? Then you're a brasher lad than I thought.
……你是认真的吗？真是不知天高地厚的笨女人。: You haven't given up yet? Then you're a brasher lass than I thought.
来吧，这个给你。: You can make better use of this.
这是成为薪王的法兰不死队的要塞通行证。: A medallion to gain entry to the keep of the Undead Legion of Farron, Lords of Cinder in their own right.
……我是从那里逃出来的，所以那东西对我已经没有用处了。: I don't need it. Not now I've flown the coop.
……法兰的不死队是不死人的军旅。: The Undead Legion of Farron is a caravan of Undead.
他们对狼血起誓、监视深渊，只要出现一丁点儿预兆，灭了一个国家也不眨眼。: Sworn by wolf's blood to contain the Abyss, the Legion will bury a kingdom at the first sign of exposure.
他们还有一个独特的入队考验，: Gaining admission to the Legion is a matter of some ceremony.
要是把要塞里的三个祭坛的火熄灭，通往狼血的门就会开启。: Inside their keep, snuffing out the flames of three altars opens the door to the wolf blood.
要是把要塞里的四个祭坛的火熄灭，通往狼血的门就会开启。: Inside their keep, snuffing out the flames of four altars opens the door to the wolf blood.
就算是被诅咒的不死人，还是会想相信自己很“特别”。: Even accursed Undead want to believe they're special, it seems.
法兰的不死队有个独特的入队考验。: Gaining admission to the Legion is a matter of some ceremony.
就算是被诅咒的不死人，还是会想相信特别的事啊。: Even accursed Undead want to believe they're special, it seems.
……你把薪王──那个不死队给杀死了……: You offed the Lords of Cinder, the Undead Legion...
把王带回王位，指的就是这样啊……: So that's how they're delivered to their thrones...
真是可悲，这就是王啊。: I pity the sorry souls. Is that really lordship's last reward?
管他是王还是英雄，全都是诅咒啊。: Be they lord or legend, the curse shows no mercy.
……哦，看来我得谢谢你啊。: Ah, I failed to thank you.
那些家伙可能也在找葬身的地方吧……: For helping them find their final resting place...
不过我已经决定不再逃避了，: Well, I've decided to stop running from my fate.
要恨我也行，把龙的力量交出来。: Loathe me all you like, I shall take what makes you dragon.
你这畜生，你搞什么鬼！: What in bloody hell is wrong with you!
但是你不要太小看我了……: But I've still plenty of fight in me...
这副德性还敢大摇大摆的……: You crawled out of the ground, for gods' sake...
反正不管是你还是我，都是一事无成……: We'll never amount to anything, not you, not I...
好，非常好，: Then I suppose I'll have to step in.
正好可以让我替那些家伙报仇……: And avenge the poor lost souls...
疯子，好好努力吧，: Go on, be as bloody mad as you like.
……这也是一种诅咒啊，可悲的男人……: Who can deny the curse? You poor bastard.
……这也是一种诅咒啊，可悲的女人……: Who can deny the curse? You poor girl.
如果你是龙，也好。: You are a dragon, more dragon than I.
逃跑的家伙能有这种死法，已经够好了……: A deserter could hope for no better place to die.
要恨我就恨吧，因为我才配成为龙啊……: Loathe me all you like, but I am the true dragon...
不过，我没打算用偷鸡摸狗的手段。: This shall be no petty theft.
我要你承认，我才配成为龙啊。: As the true dragon, I shall take what is rightfully mine.
……噢，你也是无火的余灰啊。: Mm, you're an Unkindled, aren't you.
我是薄暮之国的希里丝，曾是奉神之人。: I am Sirris, of the Sunless Realms, former servant of the Divinity.
我们都各自肩负使命，而使命则使人孤独，: Duties we each bear, but one's duty is a solitary affair.
恐怕我们最好不要有牵扯。: I doubt we've much to gain from fraternisation.
祈望你的旅途一路有月的庇佑。: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.
从那次分别之后，我好几次听过关于你的消息: I have since heard a great deal about you.
……听说你是个好心人。: For one, that you are most gentle of heart.
我也是肩负使命之人，但是我可以留下记号。: I, too, am bound by duty, but can offer you my sign.
人说“通往余火之路需牺牲奉献”。: I hear that cordial intrusion lays the path to embers.
如果能帮到你，就召唤我吧。: If I can be of help, by all means, do call upon me.
如果能帮到你，就触碰我的记号吧。: If you should require assistance, use my sign.
因为我们约好了啊。: Just as I promised, grandad, remember?
把你牵扯进我的使命，不，我微不足道的约定里，真的非常抱歉。: I'm afraid I've involved you in my affairs, over a little promise, at that.
……还有，非常谢谢你。: My sincerest thanks for your assistance.
如此一来，我的爷爷终于能够长眠，而我也能够死去了。: At last, my grandfather will rest in peace, and I can die.
请允许我发誓──以骑士的身份追随在你身旁。: May I take a vow? To serve you, as a knight.
……希里丝于此时开始，成为你的骑士。: I, Sirris, do hereby serve as your faithful knight.
不论何时、不论何处，就算与众人为敌，: Wherever, whenever, I am needed, and even if all should turn against you...
……祈望你的旅途一路有月的庇佑。: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.
如果能帮到你，不论是什么事，请告诉我。: If I may ever be of assistance, call upon me.
因为我已经是你的骑士了。: I am your knight, forever and true.
看来我踰矩了……: I am afraid I have overstepped my bounds.
不过，如果有一天你能接受我的誓言，: But if you might ever reconsider, and allow me to avow myself to you...
届时请和我说一声。: Do not hesitate to speak up.
噢，是你。你愿意接受我的誓言了？: Oh, hello again. May I avow myself to you?
我将以骑士的身份追随在你身旁。: As a faithful knight, yours and true.
你这家伙已经变成游魂了吗？: You've been clean Hollowed, have you?
要是如此，我不会手下留情。: Then I will show no mercy.
因为我还不能死啊。: This is not my time to die.
……游魂啊，安静沉眠便是……: Wretched Hollow. Your long sleep begins...
噢，感谢你前一阵子的拔刀相助。: Mm, I have not thanked you, for your generous rescue.
那个暗灵是罗莎莉亚的指头，是聚集在暗处的卑鄙、堕落之子。: That Dark Spirit was one of Rosaria's Fingers. Vile bastard offspring who lurk in the darkness.
……话虽如此，那却是可怖的入侵者。: Fearsome invaders, to say the least.
如果我独自对付，一定会为时已晚。我再次向你道谢。: I would not have made it alone. You have my deepest gratitude.
还有，如果我能在你的旅途中有所帮助，就碰触我的记号吧。: If you require help on your travels, I offer you my sign.
……噢，你变成罗莎莉亚的指头了。: Mm, I see that you are now a Finger of Rosaria.
你肯定有什么缘由，但如此一来，我们已经不是同路人了。: Your path is wholly different to mine.
永别了，好心人啊: Gentle Unkindled, I bid you farewell.
……让我们以敌人的身份再会吧。: If we meet again, it will be as adversaries.
原来如此，你已经是个名副其实的指头了。: Yes, I see, an arrant Finger you've become.
我本来就不会原谅你们这些指头，一根都不原谅！: I will cut each Finger from the hand.
……堕落之子啊，安静沉眠便是……: You poor bastard. May you rest soundly.
非常感谢你拔刀相助。: Thank you for your kind assistance.
祈望你有月的庇佑。: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.
你还打算老实地去找舍弃王位的薪王们，没错吧？: And fast on the trail of the Lords absconded?
……那么，这血红眼眸给你。: Then these red eyes are for you.
为了使命、为了取得暂时的力量，去夺取余火吧。: Use them to pillage embers, and briefly heighten your strength, for your duty.
这才够称为无火的余灰啊。: What else are unkindled ashes good for?
为了取得暂时的力量，去夺取余火吧。: Pillage embers, for briefly heightened strength, for your duty.
……好久不见了。: Well, hasn't it been some time.
你还记得吗？我是之前在洛斯里克，交给你血红眼眸的人。: Remember me? I slipped you those red eyes back in Lothric.
你还记得吗？我是之前在这里，交给你血红眼眸的人。: Remember me? I slipped you those red eyes some time ago.
……看来你很热衷此道，那我再告诉你一件事。: You're making quite an effort of it. So I thought you might like to know.
如果你想要完整的血红眼眸，: If you yearn for a proper red eye orb, one that is uncracked...
就去把毁灭于黑暗的古老小国的幸存者──“吸魂鬼”杀了吧。: Then kill the Darkwraith, survivor of the land swallowed by darkness.
那个人一直被囚禁在洛斯里克最深处的地下监牢……: He has been a prisoner, for many ages. In the deepest cell in all Lothric...
那个人一直被囚禁在这栋建筑物后方的塔中，最深处……: He has been a prisoner, for many ages. Deep below the tower, just behind us now...
喂，我明白你在想什么。你渴望入侵、渴望抢夺吧？: I can see it in your eyes. If you didn't invade, didn't pillage, whatever would you do?
……不过，那家伙居然会甘于待在这儿……: The stones on that bastard, to show his face round here...
这羊皮披得真是漂亮啊。: Though he does well to hide his claws...
……哦，你拿到真正的血红眼眸了。: Ah-hah, you've found a proper red eye...
太棒了，我果然没看错，你就是这种男人。: Brilliant. I knew you were no ordinary man.
太棒了，我果然没看错，你就是这种了不得的女人。: Brilliant. I knew you were a dangerous woman.
尽情入侵、尽情抢夺吧。: Now invade and pillage all you like.
……如果比起无聊的使命，你更好此道，就来成为指头吧。: And if you grow weary of your duty, you, too, may become a Finger.
来侍奉幽邃教堂的罗莎莉亚吧。: Come on, give yourself to Rosaria, of the Cathedral of the Deep.
你就尽情入侵、尽情抢夺吧。: Now invade and pillage all you like.
……哦，你已经侍奉罗莎莉亚了啊。: Ahh, so you've chosen to serve Rosaria after all.
那你也是她的指头，而我的评价也会随之提升。: She will be pleased with me for finding her another Finger...
罗莎莉亚的指头，是为她献上舌头的家伙，: Rosaria's Fingers need only fetch tongues for their mistress.
你要像黄指头一样认定别人是同伴，也随你高兴，: Like Yellowfinger, you can choose to believe that all Fingers share camaraderie.
但别要求他人配合你的想法。: But do not force your romance upon the rest of us.
……所谓罗莎莉亚的指头，是指为她献上舌头的家伙，: Rosaria's Fingers need only fetch tongues for their mistress.
你要认定别人是同伴，也随你高兴，: You are free to believe that all Fingers share camaraderie.
……那个浑蛋，还想得寸进尺到什么地步……: That bastard, who does he think he is?
那只猪……非得让他好好解释清楚。: He needs to be reminded. Of the grovelling pig that he is...
如果你打算妨碍骑士处私刑，那连你也是我的敌人！: If you dare question this knight's justice, an enemy of mine you shall be!
死在堆肥里吧！污秽的臭猪！: Drown in your trough! You filthy pig!
罗莎莉亚的指头们，彼此并不是同伴。: Rosaria's Fingers take no allegiance with one another.
而这只猪做了该被宰的事: And this pig fully deserved his death.
……至少我是这么认为的。: At least, as far as I see it.
这只猪做了该被宰的事: This pig fully deserved his death.
你这禽兽，好好记在心里……: You rotten beasts, don't you ever forget...
你们到底……污蔑了什么……: Just what it is you're ravaging...
……哦，没想到会看到你，真是吓人。: Well, well, never expected to see you here.
对那种发烂的东西，你居然会有所欲望啊。: Couldn't resist her any longer, in all her festering glory?
对那种发烂的东西，你居然会有所同情啊。: Felt sorry for the poor thing, in all her festering glory?
你真是不知满足，连她的灵魂都想污蔑。: And now you want to ravage her soul, as well.
……不过，既然是我播下的种，是该自己好好收拾。: I sowed the seeds. I'll prune the mess.
我以女神骑士李奥纳德之名在此发誓。: I, Leonhard, swear so upon my vows to the goddess.
……哦，你还不放弃啊。: Well, well, back for more, are you?
你就是这种男人，我果然没看错。: No ordinary man, are you. I knew it all along.
你就是这种了不得的女人，我果然没看错。: Vicious one, aren't you. I knew it all along.
你真是不知满足，连灵魂都满是污秽。: And now you want to ravage her soul, as well.
……那时还能网开一面，但现在我就不能放过你。: You are no longer of use. You'll run free no more.
她的灵魂决不会被任何人污蔑，: No one will despoil her soul.
更不用谈像你这种披了人皮的禽兽！: Certainly no beast wrapped in human skin!
你为什么如此渴求她的灵魂！: What do you want with her soul?
禽兽有肉体就该知足了吧！: Isn't flesh enough for a sick beast!
……你这恐怖的、贪心的禽兽……: You are a vile, rapacious beast...
我是千不该、万不该让你接触她……: I should have never let you near her...
女神的骑士永不败阵。: A knight of the goddess does not die.
你听得到吗？听得到的话，就快住手。: Can you even hear me? If you can, cease this at once.
……我终于明白了。: I see, I see, as clear as day.
你仅仅是头饥饿的禽兽，: You are a vile, starved beast.
你这禽兽，搞清楚你龇牙相向的对象。: You beast. You've trifled with the wrong knight.
你这东西，居然是她的指头啊。: You are unbecoming of a Finger.
不可饶恕，你这污秽的禽兽……: Neither she, nor I, will have you, vile beast...
我是这个祭祀场的奴仆，名叫安德烈。: I am Andre. I serve at this shrine.
如你所见，我是打造武器的铁匠。: As a humble smith, forging weapons.
你在寻找薪王吧？: You're in search of the Lords of Cinder, I trust?
这可不是一趟轻松的旅行，你一定需要强有力的武器，: A toilsome journey I'd wager. You'll require good arms.
我是铁匠，也是为此而生的啊。: I am a smith, such is my purpose.
人没事就好。: Tis good to see y' in good health.
不然就白费我锻造的武器了。: I don't want to see m' work squandered!
说到武器和防具，基本上都很耐用，: Weapons and protection are sturdy enough, by and large.
不过，如果你过度使用，当然还是会坏。: But when overused, they'll eventually break.
所以要是耐久度下降了，就要好好修理啊，: When their durability is low, repair becomes a necessity.
使用光粉，或者是去营火休息都可以。: Use a powder, or simply rest at a bonfire.
但万一武器还是坏了，就到我这里来吧。: But should chance impel them break, bring them me.
话说回来，武器坏了，它们自己也会难受吧。: They take no pleasure in breaking, I assure y'.
所以尽可能善待它们吧。: So, handle them with care, if y' would.
锻造武器的方式，大致分成两类──: There are two ways to smith weapons.
单纯强化，还有质变强化。: Simple reinforcement is one, and infusion the other.
强化很简单，不改变武器的本质，纯粹增强武器；: Reinforcement is straight forward. It strengthens a weapon without altering its property.
而质变强化就是改变武器的本质，属于高级锻造。: Infusion is a more advanced form of smithing that infuses an element.
强化要用楔形石，质变强化要用宝石，需要的材料不一样。: Reinforcement requires titanite, and infusion requires gems.
接着就是我铁匠的工作了。: Bring the stones, and I'll do the smithing.
武器是战友，好好锻造的话，它绝对不会背叛你。: In battle, y' weapons are yer only friends. Forge them well, and they won't let y' down.
如果想以宝石引起质变强化，必须要有叫作“余烬”的锻造道具。: Infusing weapons with gems requires a special kind of coal.
有几个特殊的宝石，仅凭我手上的余烬没办法使用。: My humble coals won't be any use infusing more unusual gems.
身为铁匠这样说真的很没面子，但这件事我也束手无策。: I know, it's an awful shame, but it's all I have.
抱歉，不要太责怪我，: Oh, please, don't give me that look.
别看我这样，我心思可是很细腻的啊。: Believe it or not, I'm quite thin-skinned.
哦，这个是……不死队的余烬啊。: Oh, my...this coal is from the Undead Legion...
法兰的监视者们，就是用这余烬锻造武器……: Used to forge the weapons of Farron's Abyss Watchers.
这是贵重物品啊。竟然把这东西交给我，真令人高兴啊。: A fine prize. I'm honoured to be endued with it.
这下子，特殊的宝石也能用在质变强化上啦。: Now I'll be equipped to infuse special gems.
对啊，这是我第一次碰上，我已经开始技痒啦。: Praise the gods, eh. Time to put this brawn to use!
哦哦，这个是……那位巨人的余烬啊。: My, my... The coal of that peaceable giant.
真令人怀念。不过这下子，他也不可能活命了吧……: Seems like ages past. I imagine his passing was long ago.
真难过啊，他人还不赖的……: I miss the old bugger, I do.
谢啦。他留下来的余烬，我可不能浪费掉。: My thanks. I'll be sure this coal is put to good use.
我绝对会锻造出很棒的武器。: I'll be smithing weapons never afore seen by the likes of y'!
对他来说，这才是最好的供养吧。: It's but a small service, to pay my humble respects.
……你手上的那个余烬……: Lords... Where didye hap'n upon this coal?
太深沉了，已经是接近深渊的东西了……: This is much too dark. I see the Abyss in it...
但既然我身为铁匠，只要你开口，我就会使用它。: Yet, a smith I remain. I won't turn down a request.
你正为了火以及人们战斗……而我也一样啊，: Your fight is for the flame, and for y' fellow kin. Just like mine.
虽然身负和诅咒没什么不同的使命，但也就是这样，才有希望可言吧？: A cursed fate this may be, but hope remains, does it not?
哟，是你啊，等你很久了。: Oh, you've returned. I was hoping to see y'.
这是那个叫霍克伍德的受挫家伙，寄放在我这的。: That crestfallen arse Hawkwood, he handed me this.
而且他离开的样子也挺奇怪的，: He's changed a great deal since he left this place.
他一脸悲痛，说想把这个交给你啊……: Graven of face, he asked me to give it y'.
……对，找你就这件事而已。: Well, now that that task is concluded...
那么，你想要锻造什么武器？: What would y' ha' me smith today?
就算我是奴仆，也不是你的奴隶。: I may serve, but I'm no slave.
你妨碍到我工作了，快滚吧。: I have business I must attend. Be gone.
如果你找到叫原素碎片的东西，记得拿到我这里来，: If you find any Estus Shards, bring 'em 'ere.
你手上的两个原素瓶，不管哪一个我都能帮忙强化。: They can be used to reinforce either of y' Estus Flasks.
原素瓶是你们的宝物，也是维系生命与意志的东西吧？: Without those flasks, you'd want for life or focus.
而且这还能一直沿用下去，稍微下点功夫，不会有损失啊。: And they'll always stay with y'. Why not treat 'em well?
哦，这个是……不死队的余烬，还有长这样的啊。: Well, well... What's the Undead Legion doing with a coal such as this?
听说法兰的监视者是靠结晶老者的碎片借得力量，: I'd heard one of the Crystal Sages had sided with Farron's Abyss Watchers.
看来真有这么一回事。: I suppose it must be true.
你啊，这可是法术余烬啊，我也是第一次看到。: You should know, this coal is imbued with magic. First one I've ever seen.
因为不管做学问还是贤者，都不可能跟我扯上边吧？: Hardly a surprise is it? I've never been one for books or wise men.
哎呀、哎呀，来了个灰烬大人啊。: A pleasure to make thine acquaintance, Ashen One.
我老太婆是这个祭祀场的侍女。: I am but a humble handmaid of the shrine.
只要是能帮助您完成使命的必备物品，都准备好了。: I've lots of little things to ease the burden of a weary traveller.
……当然了，我这老太婆也是不死人，但我不是做慈善事业啊。: ...And yes, I'm Undead, too, but not so charitable as to give my goods away.
灰烬大人啊，去夺取灵魂，再拿过来吧。: Ashen One, fetch souls, and bring them to me.
找我这个老太婆，有什么事啊？: How may I be of service?
灰烬大人，欢迎再拿点儿灵魂过来啊。: Ashen One, be sure to bring more souls.
……灰烬大人，如果您嫌我老太婆的东西卖得不全，: Ashen One, if my wares are not to thy satisfaction,
如此一来，老太婆我就能用骨灰变点儿新东西出来了。: With ash, I'll fashion new wares.
靠死亡吃饭，不就是我们的诅咒吗？: Is it not our sorry fate, to sup on death?
……哎呀、哎呀，您把骨灰拿来了啊。: Gracious. Passing fine ash thou'st given.
还希望新商品会讨您喜欢啊。: I only hope these new wares content thee...
暖得像这人刚刚还活着一样……: Almost as if it had lived, mere moments ago...
哎呀，不好意思，我多嘴了啊。: Oh, forgive an old woman's idle prate.
灰烬大人怎么可能做这么残忍的事情……: I'm sure an ashen one such as thee would never indulge such base contrivances...
不过话说回来，您也明白，: And even temptation were to prevail...
我这老太婆可是很贪心的……: I'd overlook a little mischief if thou would'st but thy purse-strings loosen...
……灰烬大人，您又拿来一份可怜虫的骨灰了啊。: Ashen One, what woeful umbral ash is this.
这是份愚人的骨灰……可以换得的物品也少得很吧。: This barren dust, stuff of a fool, won't yield aught.
那么，这是在哪里捡到的呢？只是觉得好玩才问问，告诉我这个老太婆吧。: Where did'st thou happen upon the stuff? Tell me, for the sport.
真是可怜虫，居然在这衰亡之世里做梦……: Clinging to lofty dreams in this dying world...more's the pity.
果然如此，这是份愚人的骨灰啊。: It must come from one most foolish indeed.
……不愧是灰烬大人。: As the Ashen One ought be...
居然对我这老太婆……做出这么残忍的事……: Vile brute. I'm but a poor old woman...
不过很遗憾……因为一直被传火的诅咒束缚，: But, marvel on. Remember well, I am Undead.
我老太婆就是这样，不会死。: Bound forever by the shrine's curse...
与其关心这件事，您不如好好后悔吧，: Well, little sense in timidity now.
我这老太婆可是贪得无厌，到死了也无所谓啊。: I'll have thee for all thou'rt worth...
我老太婆刚准备好新商品，: I've just come upon some fine new wares.
您的直觉还真灵啊。: How is it thou seem'st privy to this knowledge?
钟没响，却有迷路的人出现。: A lost lamb wandereth in, with nary a peep from the bell.
……不过，看样子您很明白我老太婆是做什么的。: Well, thou shouldst my purpose know.
现在已经暗下来，空无一人，火会静静地消逝。: Tis dark for now, and not a soul stirs. But remember, fires are known to fade in quiet.
……您听过这句不成熟的话语吗？: Knowest thou of that soppy gossip?
所谓「通往余火之路需牺牲奉献」。: That cordial intrusion layeth the path to embers.
所以啊，灰烬大人，您方便的话，去寻找蜡石吧。: And so thou art in need of a soapstone, ashen one.
接着再拿点灵魂来，赏给我这个老太婆吧。: Then thy pockets will o'erflow with souls to trade to me.
……哎呀、哎呀，您又拿来了一份温热的骨灰啊。: Well, well, what warm umbral ash have we here.
说起来，大人跟死亡似乎有特别的缘分……: It's as if thy fate were with death entwined...
不过话说回来，大人，您也明白，: As by now thou surely knowest,
……哦，你好像不是看守人啊？: Ahh, you're no jailer, are you?
看来是外来的人，而且是在钟响之后才来……: No, no, you're from far away. And judging by the bell...
你就是那个无火的余灰吗？: You must be some of that unkindled ash.
有趣。要是你真的是，我想拜托你一件事。: Remarkable. If that's true, then I have a favour to ask.
这道高墙下方有座肮脏的小镇，: Below the High Wall is a musty little town.
那里不是王者们的故乡，那是很久以前就存在的……不死镇。: Not the home of any lord, just a very old settlement of Undead.
小镇里应该有个叫罗蕾塔的老女人，: An old woman, Loretta, lives there.
当然，要是你肯帮我完成这件事，我不会让你白忙，: I-I'm not asking for charity. In fa- in fact, if you do this for me...
我可以帮助你。: I'll be sure to repay you in kind.
虽然我是渺小的小偷，但是我比那些吃得好穿得好的蠢蛋还有用。: I-I may be a petty thief, but I've more wits than most royalty.
……了解了，我相信你。: Very well. I humbly place my faith in you.
我是不死聚落的葛雷瑞特，愿意帮助你。: I am Greirat of the Undead Settlement, and I promise to assist you.
把这个戒指交给高墙下方的小镇里，一个叫罗蕾塔的老女人。: Give this ring to old Loretta at the base of the High Wall.
……总之，拜托你啦。: ...Do your part, and I'll do mine.
要是你改变心意了，再和我说一声吧。: But if you change your mind, give me a shout, eh?
我是渺小的小偷，人会暂时待在这儿。: I-I'm only a petty thief. I've nowhere else to go.
况且就算现在出去，也什么事都做不成啊。: Not like there's anything calling to me out there...
哦，你怎么了？改变心意了？: Oh, what have we here? Changed your mind, perhaps?
只要你把戒指转交出去，我就愿意帮助你。: You deliver the ring, and I offer my co-operation.
混账，你不讲道理吗！: Damn it, you've lost it, haven't you!
太好了。那，接着就轮到我尽义务了。: And in one piece. Well, now it's time I do my part.
要是你有想要的东西就说吧，不要客气。: Whatever trinket you need, speak up.
嗯，不过，东西的出处就不要过问了啊。: Just don't ask me where I got them.
哦，你回来得正好。: Oh, hello, you've come at a good time.
虽然花了点儿时间，收获还不小啊。: It took some prowling, but I've finally made a score.
哦，你人也平安啊。: Oh, then, we are both safe and sound.
太好了。这一次连我自己都挺危险的呢……: Thank the gods for that. I don't like cutting things so close.
要是没有那个奇怪的洋葱大哥，说不定我现在早就没命了。: I might've died if it wasn't for that peculiar onion knight.
要是没有那个叫安里的骑士帮忙，说不定我现在早就没命了。: I might've died if it wasn't for that little knight Anri.
不过，这样也值得啦。: But in the end, it all paid off.
来，来看看吧。我想应该有派得上用场的东西。: Take a good look. They're sure to be of some use.
这里还真是无聊，就算拿着赃物也没有地方用，对吧？: Oh, this place is a bore. What good is thievery if you've nowhere to go?
再见了，我接下来要离开一阵子，暂时告别了。: Good-bye. I will leave for some time. So long for now.
你要平安无事啊，不然的话，我就白费力气了。: Do stay safe, you hear? Or my efforts will have been for naught.
约定好的事，你可不要忘了啊。: Do me a favour, and don't forget our promise.
记得要把戒指转交给高墙下方的小镇里，一个叫作罗蕾塔的老女人啊。: Give the ring to old Loretta at the base of the High Wall.
这请托的确很不怎么样，嗯，只是我有点儿睡不安稳啊……: A nuisance, I know, but it'll help me tie up some loose ends.
哦，是你啊，我有点儿想法，你能听听看吗？: Ahh, there you are. I was thinking...
你也知道，我是个渺小的小偷: You know I'm a petty thief.
……所以啊，我想要出发去偷点儿东西。: Well, perhaps I'll go on the prowl.
反正所有人不是死了就是变成游魂，就这两种吧？: Everyone's dead or hollowed away anyway, right, so...
既然这样，不如把那些武器防具、宝物拿给你用，还比较值得。: I might as well fetch some weapons or treasure for you.
……谢啦，交给我吧。: Thank you. You will not be disappointed.
小偷葛雷瑞特可是远近驰名啊。: Greirat the Thief was once a well-known name.
虽然到后来还是被抓了……: Until I ended up rotting in a cell...
是挺可惜的，但既然你都这么说了，我就照做。: If that's your wish, I can only obey.
不过要是你改变心意了，和我说一声啊，: But, feel free to change your mind later.
不然再这样下去，我的本领都要生疏了。: I wouldn't want to lose my touch...
怎么了？你改变心意了吗？: What is it? Have you changed your mind?
要我去偷就直说吧，我随时都可以出发。: I'm ready to go thieving at a moment's notice. Just give me the word.
哦，是你啊，我听说过。: Ahh, hello, fine work, I say.
你找到冷冽谷的伊鲁席尔了，对吧？: Discovering Irithyll in the Boreal Valley, all in a day's work.
传说中，那里是古老月之贵族的城镇，绝对有一堆宝物……: If the tales are true, it is home to old moon-worshipping nobles, and should be packed with treasure.
怎么样？要不要再让我去偷点东西啊？: What do you think? Shall I go and see what I can find?
我堂堂小偷葛雷瑞特，你就好好等着看吧。: I am Greirat, the thief. What I bring back will be worthy of that name.
居然要我放过贵族的城镇，实在是很不甘心啊。: I hate to leave a city of nobles ripe for the picking...
我想再去偷点儿东西。: About leaving for another round of thieving.
洛斯里克城里面，一定有你能派上用场的东西。: There must be something of use in Lothric Castle.
我知道这很危险……那座城会吃人。: I-I'm aware of the danger. That castle is a deathtrap.
在那座城还繁荣的时候，偷溜进去的家伙一个都没回来。: Not a single man has returned from the castle unscathed, even back in the day.
不过啊，我不想到死都只是卑微的过街老鼠: But I don't want sit around and die a petty rat.
……毕竟我是你的朋友啊。: And I consider myself your friend.
……谢啦，谢谢你肯相信我。: Thank you, for placing your trust in me.
没什么啦，不用担心我，洛斯里克就像我家后院一样。: Oh, don't you worry. I know Lothric like the back of my hand.
……这样啊，我知道了，你人真好。: Right, fine. You're very thoughtful, you are.
因为我刚才说的都是真话啊。: I meant every word of what I said.
是的话就和我说一声吧，我自己也不想到死都只是个卑微的过街老鼠啊。: I hope you do. I lived a petty rat, but would rather not die as one.
……谢了，我已经预感到了。: Thank you. I-I'm not surprised, though.
哎，就是那个，谢礼了。: As, well, a little trinket of thanks, I suppose.
是我已经没有利用价值了吗……: I've gone and run my course, haven't I?
畜生，你为什么要这么做！: Cold piss, what the devil is it now!
你该不会认为小偷就该被抓吧，: I get caught once, and now this!
怎么可能被抓！混账！: One bloody time! Curse the gods!
老鼠被追急了，连猫都敢咬啊……: "The cornered rat will lick the balls of a cat."
你已经没救了吗……: You're headed for the brink, aren't you?
但是我也不能被干掉啊。: Well, you won't drag me down.
我就陪你打吧！阴森的灰烬混账！: En guarde, you crusty ash bastard!
混账东西，为什么会这样……: Cold piss, why did it come to this...
我以为……我是你的朋友啊……: And I thought we were friends...some friends...
……哦，真令我吃惊啊，没想到会有人造访。: Well, this is unexpected. I don't often have visitors.
你也看到了，这里是我的书斋。: This is my study that you've happened upon.
没事的话，我想继续安静看书啊。: If you haven't any business, I've reading to get back to.
没错，我是魔法师，也可以教你点东西。: Indeed, I am a sorcerer. With plenty to share.
有人会自以为是英雄，就要求我无偿劳动。: What champion demands service without recompense?
你应该不是这种男人吧？: Clearly, you are not that sort of man.
你应该不是这种女人吧？: Clearly, you are not that sort of woman.
……不是的话，答应我一件事情。: So, you will make me a promise.
我可以教你，但你要把知识带来，: That in exchange for my teaching, you will bring me knowledge.
也就是记载魔法奥秘的卷轴，把它带来给我。: In the form of scrolls detailing sorcery's secrets.
……如何？办得到吗？: Well? Can you assure me of this?
你也不是蠢蛋，应该明白承诺的轻重。: You are no fool. I take it you understand the weight of a promise.
无火的余灰，我就传授你魔法吧。: Unkindled one, I shall teach you sorceries.
哼哼，模仿学院也不赖嘛……: We will learn together, it shall be like our very own school.
……我不讨厌坦白的男人，: I can respect an honest man.
……我不讨厌坦白的女人，: I can respect an honest woman.
但是我已经受够无偿劳动了。: But I've already put in more than my fair share of gratuitous service.
等你回心转意，再来找我。: Though you're welcome back if you change your mind.
也就是记载魔法奥秘的卷轴，把它带来就好。: In the form of scrolls detailing the secrets of sorcery.
……别想了，你不适合魔法，: You'd better not. Sorcery is not for everyone.
你有你的路，但不是魔法这一条。: You have your own methods. Sorcery need not be one of them.
无火的余灰，你必然有你的使命吧？: You're Unkindled. Shouldn't you get back to your duty?
……哦，你不放弃啊。: Oh, I thought you'd already given up.
但是别想了，你不适合魔法。: Well, nothing has changed. You're not inclined for sorcery.
学习魔法就是这么一回事。: It is either a natural fit, or no fit at all.
……哦，你有什么事吗？: Well, well... There's something different about you, isn't there?
这里是我的书斋，我想继续安静看书了。: This is my study, and I've plenty of reading to do.
你真的有事找我？: Do you have business with me?
唉，那就没办法了。: Then we are through and done.
……唉，我还是很讨厌杀人啊……: Gods, this business never did agree with me...
唉，你实在是很烦！: Oh, I've had it with you!
抱歉，只好让你闭嘴了！: Not another word will come out of your mouth!
就给你个血淋淋的教训，让你明白不良居心终有报应！:
Perhaps this will teach you!
That petty mischief will not go overlooked!
……死小鬼，终于闭嘴了吧……: That ought to keep you quiet...
再提醒你，我是彼海姆的欧贝克，能传授你魔法。: Again, I'm Orbeck of Vinheim, here to teach you sorceries.
但是你要先记住，关于魔法师的理想，所谓龙的二元性……: Let us begin with the basics. The ideal sorcerer bears the twin faces of the dragon...
……别一脸嫌弃嘛。: ...Oh, you could at least act as if you're paying attention!
既然你跟我搭话，代表你想学魔法吧？: I suppose this means that you're after sorceries?
你来得正好，我正想要休息一下。: Perfect timing, too. I'm in need of a diversion.
嗯？怎么吗？你是忘了什么吗？: Oh, what is it? Forgot something?
还真是不令我意外。: That would be quite like you.
说是模仿学院，我也做得很开心啊……: It's been nice running our own little school.
……抱歉，你可能会嫌我烦，但你可别忘了。: I don't mean to seem overbearing, but have you forgotten?
就是记载魔法奥秘的卷轴，把它带来给我。: In the form of scrolls detailing the secrets of sorcery.
这是你自己许下的承诺啊。: I hope you're not one to break a promise.
我可不打算无偿劳动……: Come now, I've been charitable long enough.
哦，有个东西要给你。: Oh, I have something for you.
你也差不多到了可以自称魔法师的境地，: You're a fine sorcerer now, no mistake.
也该拥有这个证明了。: You should have something to prove it.
收下吧，难得我送人东西不求回报喔。: Go on. If I'm giving something away, you'd better well take it.
……你喜欢嬉戏吗？: How do you like gimmicks, friend?
这是消除声响的魔法师标记，也是一种暗号。: This is a sign, a cipher employed by sorcerers who use quietude to their advantage.
有了这个，就算不认识彼此，也不会互相为敌。: With this, you can be sure to tell friend from foe from your very first encounter.
虽然这已经是太久远的老规矩，: It's a very old practice at this point...
但是你早就得到认识它的资格，我才会告诉你。: ...but one that you deserve to know.
……喂，你可不要随便杀人啊。: It is folly to claim lives recklessly, friend. Do not be tempted.
不管对方是谁，你又夺走谁的性命，总有一天都会有报应。: No matter the victim's stature, every killing has a consequence.
我弄脏了双手，却没发觉这个真理。: Even as I bloodied my hands, I never realised this simple truth.
哼，还真是个蠢蛋……: Hmph. There I was, the very definition of a fool...
……我曾是彼海姆的密探。: In Vinheim, I was an assassin.
是披着魔法师的外皮，干着拿钱办事的杀手。: A sorcerer only in name, a killer for hire.
当时我真是太蠢了，还坚信有朝一日我能学到正统的魔法。: What a fool I was, thinking one day I would learn real sorceries.
结果成了不死人，被逐出学院……: When I became Undead, I was exiled from the school.
但在这里，我反而能接触到魔法的奥秘。: But here I am, now, exploring the depths of sorcery.
都是拜你所赐……: All thanks to you, I might add.
我已经没东西可以教你了。: In fact, I have nothing more to teach.
……时机也差不多成熟了。: Well, I suppose it's high time to call it quits.
再这么下去，我们之间的承诺就要失效了。: I would hate to see our agreement end sourly.
我不愿意让这种事情发生。: Better left tucked away, as a nice memory.
居然学会这么多的魔法。: All these sorceries, and you've mastered every one.
如果在龙学院，你一定会……: If this were the Dragon School, you'd be...
……不，八成会遭到严重排挤，再被学院放逐吧。: ..well, overtly despised, and banished from the place.
……不过，嗯，时机也差不多成熟了。: Well, I suppose it's time I packed my bags.
是我没办法继续履行承诺。: I would hate to see our agreement end sourly.
我不希望这样。: Better left tucked away, as a pleasant memory.
没想到还有未知的法兰不死队魔法。: Then the Undead Legion of Farron possesses sorceries quite unknown.
谢谢你，你的确有遵守承诺。: Thank you, for upholding your end of the bargain.
就算我在那儿花费再多时间，也不会知道这个吧。: I doubt I ever would have made this discovery alone.
好了，来解读吧。新的魔法必定会对你有用处。: Now, let us unravel the thing, so you may put these new sorceries to use.
……你找到一个不得了的东西啊。: Oh, my! You've made quite the discovery!
这是那位大帽子罗根的卷轴，: This is a scroll of the prodigious Big Hat Logan.
是远古彼海姆失传的伟大魔法。: A masterful sorcerer, long missed in Vinheim.
没想到像我这种人，也有接触它的一天……: And now, we have his scroll, right here in my very hands.
这是结晶魔法，是只存在传说中的白龙力量……:
This is a crystal sorcery, created by the pale dragon,
thought only to exist in legend...
感谢你，这可是神秘啊。: I am ever grateful to you. This is truly sublime.
我拿不出能报答你的东西……: I am afraid this is a debt I cannot repay, only...
但是我会竭尽全力解读它，你等着吧。: I will be sure to unravel it for you. Just a moment.
哦，这……可稀奇了，: Oh, my... This is very unusual.
居然是远古的黄金魔法国度──乌拉席露。: It's from Oolacile, an ancient land of golden sorceries.
八成连龙学院都没有失传这么久的魔法卷轴。: Not even the Dragon School possesses such a long-lost scroll.
黄衣研究者要是看到它，必定会垂涎三尺: What would the xanthous scholars say, with their ridiculous headwear.
……而且戴着那个奇妙的头冠垂涎喔。: They would simply slaver over this find.
很可惜，一切到此为止吧！: With regret, I will end this here and now!
再见了，那些模仿学院的事情，我做得很开心啊……: Farewell. We had a nice little school going.
东西用完了，就要丢了是吗……: Is that all that I'm worth?
我的梦也作够了……: It was nice while it lasted...
我是柯弭库斯，是位老咒术师。: I am Cornyx, an old pyromancer.
现在就像你看到的──是个笼中老鸦……: A crow in his cage, as you see, now.
不过总有几次有趣的邂逅嘛。: But here we are, an encounter for the ages!
喂，我问你，我听说无火的余灰是接纳事物的容器，: I hear the Unkindled make for fine vessels.
怎么样？想不想跟着我这老头子，学习咒术啊？: Care to learn some pyromancies from this old man?
你很聪明，懂得所谓奇货可居。: Most wise. A chance encounter should not be squandered.
那么，我是大沼的柯弭库斯，: To reiterate, I am Cornyx, of the Great Swamp.
你还真笨，人说老乌鸦才有这般智慧啊。: Most foolish. This old crow has a little knowledge of his own, you know.
唉，不了解也罢。: Bah. No sense in spelling it out.
这事情也急不得，如果你脑袋变聪明了，再过来吧。: I will not rush you. You will return, once you are enlightened.
毕竟我们俩都是不死人，虽然也是因为这样被束缚了。: We are, after all, both Undead. And both prisoners, in our own ways.
哦，是你啊，真快啊。: Well, hello, That was certainly quick.
哦，是你啊，真慢啊。: Well, hello. You certainly took your time.
然后呢？有没有稍微变聪明点儿？: Are you any more enlightened on this occasion?
你做这种事，到底有什么好处？: Little bird, what's to be gained?
哎呀，回来了，无火的余灰啊。: Ahh, there you are, Unkindled One.
首先，我先感谢你。: I wish to express my gratitude.
我身为咒术师也是敬陪末座，听人说是营火──能看到那么神秘的火焰，真是三生有幸。: For trusting a lowly pyromancer, and allowing me to gaze upon this majestic flame.
……就如同我答应你的，我要教你咒术。: As promised, I will impart pyromancies to you.
首先，对你来说，火也是不可或缺的。: But first, you'll need a flame of your own.
小心点儿，不要害得自己被火烧光了。: Careful you don't burn yourself with it.
师父最喜欢勤奋学习的弟子了。: I am pleased to have a pupil as dedicated as you.
记得再回来啊。: Do not be gone for long.
没了弟子的师父可是不象样啊。: What is a teacher without a pupil?
说到学习咒术，我是师父，而你是弟子。: To learn pyromancies, you must vow to become my pupil.
就是这么一回事，哎呀，就当作是卖给我这老头面子吧。: I know, I know, but such is the way of the world. Respect your elders, and so on.
不讲咒术，在这世上做人处事就是这样。: And pyromancy, of course, is no exception.
对了，如果你想要学习更高阶的咒术，那你需要有咒术书。: Oh, we'll need a pyromancy tome to learn more advanced pyromancies.
虽然这是旁门左道，不过是条最快的捷径。: Though unorthodox, that would be the most expedient way to make progress.
如果这里是大沼，我就会说“你有那个时间找书，还不如去做些严酷的修行”啊。: If this were the Great Swamp, and you had the luxury of time, we could have trained you the hard way.
如果你打算找咒术书的话，那我要告诉你一件事。: If you seek pyromancy tomes, take this sage advice.
王的故乡与漂泊汇流之地──洛斯里克。: The lands of the Lords converge upon Lothric.
这块土地是咒术的故乡，也可以说是漂流后聚集的地方。: The home of pyromancies drifts comparatively close, as well.
……大沼的咒术师之间有此传说：: At least, that is what pyromancers of the Great Swamp believe.
故乡之名为伊札里斯。说真的，我还真想见识原始的咒术。: The place is called Izalith. Oh, how I wish to behold a primal pyromancy.
哎呀，不过这也只是传说，是不是真的就不保证了。: Well, these are old tales. No one knows where the truth begins, or ends.
对了，关于你找到的那本地下墓地的咒术书啊……: Ahh, you found this tome in the Catacombs...
书里的咒术特性很接近混沌。: This spell is akin to chaos.
说不定真的和咒术的故乡──伊札里斯有所关联……: It may even serve as a link to Izalith, home of pyromancies...
过去咒术的始源──伊札里斯，曾被自身产生的火焰毁灭。: The home of pyromancy, Izalith, was scorched by the very fire it created.
那很有可能是混沌，也就是魔女扭曲的火焰所为。: Undoubtedly, it was a flame of chaos, tangled by a witch's hand.
话又说回来，那火焰和营火的差异，谁又能分辨得出来啊？: But who's to say that this Bonfire's flame is any different?
哦，就是这个，好怀念啊。: Yes, here we are. It's been long indeed.
只要有这本，我就能教你高阶咒术了。: With this, I can teach you more sophisticated pyromancies.
太好了，这下子我暂时能以师父的高姿态好好照顾你了。: Splendid. I can boast I am your tutor a little longer.
哦，这个……我还是第一次看到。: Well, well...I've never seen anything like this.
这名字……是地下墓地的咒术书啊……: This inscription...this tome is from the Catacombs.
真有趣，这就是教学相长的乐趣吧。: Fascinating. On this day, the teacher learns alongside the pupil.
哦哦，这不是！这不是伊札里斯的咒术书吗！: Ah, what have we here! A pyromancy tome from Izalith!
你找到咒术的故乡了吗？: Then you've found the home of pyromancy.
太棒了，想想我既是个老头又是不死人，真是件好事。: Brilliant. I will never curse being old and Undead again.
来吧，快点让我瞧瞧，然后再一起好好学习切磋吧。: Now, now, show it here, quickly. Let us channel them together.
这是只有远古的札拉曼先师才通晓的原始咒术啊！: The primal pyromancies known only to old Master Salaman!
真不敢相信，作者名克拉娜，是古代神明、伊札里斯魔女中的一人……: By the gods. This inscription reads Quelana, the ancient deity, one of the witches of Izalith...
是最后的魔女，也是流浪者。到最后一刻，她还是回到故乡了吗: The last of them, who wandered the lands. Then she must have returned to Izalith, after all.
……不过很可惜，这本书我没办法收下。: But I regret to say, I cannot accept this.
克拉娜所用的是魔女的咒术，只有女师父才能教。: Quelana's pyromancies are for witches, and must be learned from a mistress.
不过你啊，你还真是找到了好东西。: But thank you, for allowing me to peer upon such a thing.
还有，很抱歉我不是女人啊。: If only I were a woman.
……我不能收下这本书。: I'm afraid I cannot accept this.
这本咒术书是黑暗──是以人心底层不可触碰的火焰催生而成的。: This pyromancy tome is dark, and delves into the depths of men, where an untouchable flame resides.
真是抱歉，我没办法教你，应该说我没办法认同这个咒术啊。: I cannot comprehend this myself, let alone teach it to you.
在大沼，不，恐怕不管在哪里，都是禁忌的咒术。: It is a spell forbidden in the Great Swamp, and nearly everywhere else, too.
非要愚蠢非常之人，或是悲哀之人才能认同吧。: Only one terribly afflicted, or burdened by deep sorrow, could begin to understand this.
住手吧，住手啊！: Stop this, stop this at once!
好吧，这也是无奈。: Fine, fine, I see how it is.
弟子发狂，收拾残局也是师父的责任。: When a pupil strays from the path, the master must intrude.
敢小看老鸦的咒术，你可是会吃瘪啊！: Behold, the pyromancy of an old crow!
唉，也好……对垂老的鬼影来说，是段不错的时间啊……: I can't complain... This old reverie...had to end...
而且啊，你身为咒术师，还是个半吊子吧？: You've been dabbling in pyromancies, it seems?
怎么样？想不想跟着我这老头子，把咒术学得更精一点儿啊？: Well then, care to learn some pyromancies from this old man?
你人虽年少，但为什么如此轻狂……: Oh, the eternal folly of youth...
……弟子发狂，收拾残局也是师父的责任啊。: Spare the rod and spoil the child...
我还以为已经被遗忘了，真高兴。: I thought you'd all but forgotten me. How sweet.
看来我这黑瘪的身体还能逗你们这群生物开心啊。: Good to know that a skinny little heretic can still turn heads.
嗯？你……看来和那群家伙不一样啊。: Hm? Oh...you're not one of them, are you?
我向你道歉，居然把人和水蛭看成同类，真是失礼至极。: Accept my apologies, for mistaking you for one of those leeches.
那么，你在这个地方做什么？: So, what business have you here?
这里是畸形生物的住所，就连我也不例外啊。: This is a land of monstrosities. And I am no exception.
也就是说，你和传火有关，对吧。: Then you must be involved in linking of the fire.
……好啊，没关系。我一直被囚禁，也差不多觉得厌倦了。: Ahh, very well. I can do very little holed up here.
我是罪业之都的卡露拉，愿意成为你的随从。: I am Feria, of the Profaned Capital, and I hereby enter into your service.
既然如此，你没事就快滚吧。: If you've no business here, take your leave at once.
没关系，你不用顾虑我。无论如何，我都已经无法动弹了。: Ahh, don't fret over me. I'm stuck here anyway.
搞什么，你还是和水蛭同群啊。: Why, you're one of those leeches after all.
臭水蛭，我在深渊等你……: Cursed leech, I await you, in the Abyss...
再次重申，我卡露拉很感谢你。: As I said, I am Karla. And am grateful to you.
我能够回报你的，就只有魔法了: The only thing that might interest you is my sorcery.
……而且是活该受人忌讳的暗之魔法啊。: Although my dark arts are a detestable sort.
难道你真的想学吗？: That wouldn't interest you, would it?
你这活该被雷劈的家伙。: You're a wicked one, aren't you?
不过，算了。人类是黑暗的代称，你也不例外，: Very well. Humans are of the dark, and you are no different.
只是差在愿不愿意正眼看待这件事罢了。: Some may avert their eyes, but the truth remains the truth.
但是你要记得，人们却不这么想。: Be careful though. Few humans are privy to this knowledge.
我所说的事情，就当成我和你的秘密吧。: Let it be a secret, between you and I...
不过我真的除此以外一无是处。: I have nothing else, you see, nothing at all.
我说过了吧？这里是畸形生物的住所，就连我自己也不例外。: Have you so soon forgotten? That place is home only to monstrous things, and I am no exception.
啊，是你啊，不好意思啊。: Ahh, hello there. I'm sorry to say...
我真的是一无是处，: This truly is all I have.
就只会关乎人心黑暗、受人忌讳的魔法……: Detestable sorceries that delve into the darkness of man...
我很清楚，你是为了我的魔法来的吧？: Yes, yes, you require my sorceries, I presume?
就算是笨蛋弟子，我也是有感情的。: One can become quite attached, even to a bumbling apprentice.
你要好好记住。: There is one thing that you should know.
不过看你是会怕得裹足不前，还是会因为思念家乡而迫不及待——: Whether the fear will spark self-reflection, or a ruinous nostalgia...
……不管你做哪个决定，都能被允许吧。: Fear not, your choice will bring you no scorn.
啊，就是因为这样，我才会惹人嫌吧。: Ahh, it's little wonder my kindness is lost on most...
……哦，这个是……咒术书啊。: Oh, a pyromancy tome, have we?
伊札里斯的魔女──克拉娜……是魔女的咒术啊，真是有趣。: Quelana, Witch of Izalith...well, this is a fascinating pyromancy...
……好吧，既然是你的要求，: Very well. If this is your wish.
我就会拼了命解读看看。: I will unravel the thing the best I can.
还有啊，当上你的师父好像也挺有趣的啊。: Besides. It will be nice to play master for once.
……哦，又拿来了咒术书啊。: Ohh, another pyromancy tome, have we?
不过就算我是异端，你竟一直要魔法师教你咒术，: I may be a heretical sorcerer, but you bring me nothing but pyromancies!
而且是和黑暗相近的咒术，这的确很适合我啊。: And one that resonates with the dark, yes, well suited to me...
好吧，既然是你的要求，: Very well. If this is your wish.
……哦，这个是……圣典啊。: Oh, is this a Divine Tome?
你到底在想什么？: What on earth are you thinking?
不管是圣典还是奇迹，都和我不相干。: I wouldn't go near a Divine Tome or any so-called miracle.
对那些家伙而言，我是唯恐避之不及的人物吧。: And casters of miracles are sure to steer clear of me.
我很清楚，你是我的恩人。: I know, I know. I owe my life to you.
没关系。只在这里念给你听就行。: Fine, then. Just this once, I will tell you this tale.
……不过，我也是第一次做这种事，: But do understand, it will be my first time.
就当是在玩吧，不要对我要求太高啊。: I'll have no sniggering, should I err.
但我除了是有罪之人，还是禁忌的人心深渊之子。: But I am guilty. A wretched child of the Abyss.
这么一来，你还能接受我吗？: Is that something you can forgive?
……哦，这样啊。你这男人还真是怪。: Oh, really. You are no ordinary man.
……哦，这样啊。你这女人还真是怪。: Oh, really. You are no ordinary woman.
不过，好吧，我也厌倦被囚禁的生活了。: Very well. Besides, I've grown tired of imprisonment.
我是卡露拉，我答应你提出的要求。: I am Karla, and I accept your proposal.
……哦，你在迷惘吧？: Oh, are you lost on your journey?
正所谓有路可行之人才会迷路，: No matter, today's lost are conquerors tomorrow.
这是你身为英雄的证明啊。: It only demonstrates the makings of a champion.
都不会改变我对你的想法和感激之情。: It will not change my sense of gratitude, or how I think of you.
啊，若您在那里的话，请过来触碰我。: Ahh, please, whoever you are, touch me.
好暗，我什么都看不见，黑暗已经咬住我了。: The dark surrounds me, nibbles at my flesh.
虫子们一直不停地、不停地咬我、折磨我。: Little creatures, they never stop biting.
所以拜托您，请来触碰我吧。: So please, hold out your hand, and touch me...
啊，您人在那里啊。: Ahh, yes, there you are, so close, indeed.
原来我还不是孤独一人啊。: Then I am not entirely alone, just yet.
为了要成为防火女，才来到这里。: I came to this land so that I might be a Fire Keeper.
那么，触碰我、让我从黑暗中解放出来的您，肯定是英雄大人对吧？: Your touch has freed me from the darkness. You are a Champion, then?
我太软弱了，所以我想，我一定没办法成为防火女。: I am weak, and unfit to tend the flames,
就算如此，英雄大人，您还愿意让我来侍奉您吗？: But if it would not trouble you, might I enter into your service, instead?
我是卡利姆的伊莉娜，愿意侍奉您。: I, Irina of Carim, solemnly swear to serve you.
……是，我知道了，英雄大人。: Ahh, yes, of course, I understand.
还有，非常感谢您触碰我。: Even so, I thank you deeply. For your touch.
我一定不会忘记……: I will never forget it, not ever.
啊，英雄大人，您又和我搭话了啊。: Oh, sweet Champion. You still wish to converse?
我没事的。这黑暗本来就是我该肩负的使命啊。: Don't worry about me. I've long dealt in dark. It is my calling.
啊，英雄大人，欢迎回来。: Oh, Champion of Ash. Welcome back.
成不了防火女的我，竟能在营火旁边侍奉您……: I was not meant to be a Fire Keeper, but I am honoured to serve you beside the Bonfire.
真的是上天垂怜，我很感谢神和您。: The gods are ever-merciful. My gratitude lies with them, and with you.
我已经是您的人了，不管有什么事，请您尽管吩咐。: I am yours now. Your wish is my command.
您想听故事吗？不管有什么事，请您尽管吩咐。: Do you wish to hear a tale? You only have to ask.
请您一路小心，英雄大人。: Have a pleasant journey, Champion of Ash.
……英雄大人，我在故乡卡利姆的时候，是位修女。: You know, in my home of Carim, I was a nun.
所以我能够让您听到关于奇迹的故事。: I would be pleased to share the tales of miracles with you.
只是，我知道的故事其实也不算多，: Although to be honest, I only know a few.
若是我手上有圣典，就可以让您听更多的故事了。: But if I had a divine tome, I could tell you many tales and more.
真的很不好意思，只能请您找点字圣典了。: Terribly sorry, but you'll have to find me a Divine Tome in braille.
啊，您把点字圣典拿来了啊。: Ahh, you've brought me a braille Divine Tome.
那我就可以读新的故事给您听了。: Now I can tell new tales of miracles.
是开阔壮大的奇迹故事呢，说不定会比较长啊……: Tales of the greater miracles can be quite the epics...
是关于猎龙英雄的古老故事……: Tales of the old dragon hunters.
说不定这故事很适合您听呢。: Perhaps the kind you might enjoy...
英雄大人，这是本禁忌的圣典。: Champion of Ash, this Divine Tome is forbidden...
是描述潜藏在人心中深沉黑暗的故事……我想这并不适合您听。: These are dark tales of things that lurk deep within men... These stories would not please you...
不过，若是您要求，我当然还是会读给您听。: Of course, if you insist, I will read them for you.
……可是……啊、啊啊，我好怕。: Only, ahh, ahh, they frighten me so.
那些虫子们透着黑暗啃噬、折磨着我啊。: The little creatures that nibble at me in the darkness...
啊、啊啊，英雄大人，我等您很久了。: Ahh, ahh, sweet Champion. Where have you been?
那些虫子们又开始在折磨我了。: The little creatures, how they nip and bite...
啊，英雄大人，您准备要出发了吗？: Ahh, sweet Champion. Leaving so soon?
拜托您，请您早点儿回来吧。: Please, come back in good time.
我好怕，我好怕那个折磨我的黑暗。: I am frightened. Of the dark that gnaws away at me.
这么说，我可以一直、一直读故事给您听了吧……: Now I can tell you tales of miracles, forever and ever...
啊、啊啊，拜托，不管是谁，请快点儿触碰我，: Ahh, ahh, someone, please, touch me.
所以拜托，请来触碰我吧……: So please, hold out your hand, and touch me...
英雄大人，您为什么……: What have you done, sweet Champion of Ash...
非常谢谢您，英雄大人。: Thank you ever so much, sweet Champion.
请完成您伟大的使命。: May your solemn duty conclude in triumph.
……啊啊，为什么都没有人来触碰我呢？: Ohh, is there no one near to touch me?
就只剩下虫子们咬我、折磨我了？: Keep these things from eating away at me.
……啊，您又再一次触碰我了。: Ohh, you again, touch me, one last time.
那么，这次终于能依照约定杀了我吧？: And kill me, as you promised you would.
啊啊，非常谢谢您……: Ahh, thank you ever so much.
……哦……你也是那个无火的余灰啊……: Hmm... Another one of those Unkindled, are you?
不过是些无名的不死人还这么厚脸皮，会错意了吧。: All you faceless Undead, behaving as if you deserve respect.
……哼，管它呢。给你一个忠告。: Hmph. No matter. Heed my words.
你要是头脑正常，就乖乖待在棺木里吧。: If you've any sense, you'll go find a coffin to huddle up inside.
这里是游魂的出没地，头脑正常的家伙跑到这儿来，就和女人上战场一样。: You here, in this land of Hollows, you're like a frail maiden on the front lines.
……但是，要是你也和那些笨蛋一样想逞英雄，: If like the others, you're fool enough to play the champion...
就去那里，进入那个废弃教会吧。: Then go on ahead, traipse right past the abandoned church.
接着凄惨地死去吧，: You'll face death, and it won't be pretty.
在挫折受尽之前多死几次吧。: Enough death to leave you broken, time after time.
……要是你也和那些笨蛋一样想逞英雄，: If like the others, you're fool enough to play the champion...
不过你们啊，真可怜呢，根本是飞蛾扑火啊。: Hopeless, the whole lot of you. Like little moths, flittering toward a flame.
……你有偷窥监牢的癖好啊。: You like poking around in cells, do you?
……哦，你对那个女的有兴趣啊？: Ah-hah, taken an interest in her, have you?
我劝你放弃吧，那个女的连防火女都当不了，根本一无是处。: Well, she's a lost cause. Couldn't even become a Fire Keeper.
亏我还把她带到这里，准备都准备好了，居然那付德性。: After I brought her all this way, and got her all ready.
看那样子，她已经是废人了吧。: She's beyond repair, I tell you.
她连防火女都当不了，根本一无是处。: Couldn't even become a Fire Keeper.
已经是个废人了。: She's beyond repair, I tell you.
……而且还有偷窥监牢的癖好。: Now you're poking around in peoples' cells.
……你救了那个女的啦。: You've gone and rescued her, have you?
你真是怪人，居然肯去同情变成废人的女人。: How very quaint, pitying creatures that are beyond help.
……哼，算了，我本来就监视得烦了。: Very well. I'm sick of looking after her at any rate.
我是卡利姆的骑士，叫伊果。: I am Eygon, a knight of Carim.
只要你还在保护那个女的，我就是你的同伴。: I am allied to you as long as you assure the girl's safety.
干嘛？很简单好懂吧。: What's the matter? My terms are very simple.
……而且你救了那个女的啊。: Now you've gone and rescued the wench...
……哦，是你啊，好久没碰到面了。: Ahh, I know you. Been some time, since we met in person.
……哦，是你啊，好久不见。: Ahh, I know you. Been some time.
没事的，我只是想看看那女的现在怎么样而已。: I just dropped in to see how she's getting on.
不过看起来很惨嘛，: Now, what are you playing at with this circus?
和头脑有问题的老头子、老太婆，还有一堆阴沉落后家伙的棺材在一起啊。: This cesspool of doddering oldfolk and degenerates.
我放心了，这地方非常适合那个女的嘛。: Couldn't be better. She must fit in perfectly here.
我们卡利姆的骑士不会原谅烂到骨子里的背叛: This knight of Carim does not forgive betrayal.
……就算守约对象是变成废人的女人也一样。: Even a broken woman deserves her dignity...
那就由我动手，: Then I'll take care of you.
让你挫折受尽之前，多死几次！: As many times as it takes!
好好记住，我们卡利姆的骑士不会原谅烂到骨子里的背叛。: Remember. A knight of Carim does not forgive betrayal.
你这怪物，到底吃了多少灵魂进去？: You monster. Just how many souls have you eaten?
噢，初次见面，你好。: Oh, hello. How do you do.
我是亚斯特拉的安里，是无火的余灰，可能你也是吧。: I am Anri of Astora. Unkindled, like you.
在我旁边的这位是霍拉斯，和我一同旅行的朋友。: This is Horace. A friend and travelling companion.
你也在寻找薪王吧？: Are you too in search of the Lords of Cinder?
这里是活祭品之路的半途，从这里下去就是磔罚森林。: We are well along the road of sacrifices. Below us is the Crucifixion Woods.
穿越浸在水里的森林后，会到达不死队的故乡──法兰要塞。顺着路走，应该会抵达幽邃教: Beyond the flooded woods lies Farron Keep, home of the Undead Legion. Further yet is the Cathedral of the Deep.
我们正朝着深海教会──那个令人不快的艾尔德利奇的故乡前进。: We seek the cathedral, home of the grim Aldrich.
话说回来，我们都是寻找薪王的人，不管你正想前往何处，: We may go our separate ways now, but we are both seekers of lords.
既然在同一条路上，迟早会再见面吧。届时能相互帮助就好了。: The next time we cross paths, one may find the other in a time of need.
愿你的旅途路上有火指引。: May the flames guide your way.
但请你不要误会，他个性正直、人也温和，的确是位值得共尽使命的骑士。: But don't think ill of him. He's an upstanding, kind-hearted knight, a fine partner for this gruelling journey.
……如果没有和他同行，我一定会诅咒使命吧。: Without his help, I would have cursed this onerous duty long ago.
我们都是寻找薪王的人，不管你正想前往何处，: We may go our separate ways now, but we are both seekers of lords.
我是亚斯特拉的安里，之前在活祭品之路的途中和你见过面。: We spoke before on the road of sacrifices. Anri of Astora.
你也是，人平安就好。: I am well pleased to see you safe.
我们在那之后前往幽邃教堂，但是艾尔德利奇的棺木已经一片空荡。: We reached the Cathedral of the Deep, but Aldrich's coffin was empty.
看来那个食人魔的目标是前往他真正的故乡。: The man-eater must have left for his true home.
这是空棺木里的小人偶告诉我的。: The little doll in the empty coffin told me.
艾尔德利奇真正的故乡，是冷冽谷的伊鲁席尔──是座古老非常的幻影都城……: Aldrich is said to hail from Irithyll in the Boreal Valley, an ancient fabled city...
巡礼者也提到过：幻影都城位于法兰要塞前方更远的地方。: A pilgrim told me that the city lies beyond Farron Keep.
你有没有看到我的朋友霍拉斯呢？: Have you seen my companion, Horace?
说来丢脸，我们中了陷阱，之后就走散了。: To my shame, I was snared by a trap, and we've become separated.
在那之后，我们就没有见过面了。: I've not been able to find him since.
霍拉斯是位实力强大的骑士，就算孤身一人，也不可能被打败。: Horace is a valiant knight. He can look after himself, no question.
他一定在某处找我吧。: He's probably searching for me right now, with twice the resolve.
如果你见到他，请帮我告诉他: If you happen upon him, please tell him.
……我人还在地下墓地，: That I remain in the catacombs...
而且为了找他，我和平时一样放了七色石。: And will lay prism stones to guide him, as always.
对，请帮我转达。拜托你，麻烦你了。: Please send him my word, I beg of you.
如果你见到霍拉斯，请帮我告诉他: If you happen upon Horace, please tell him.
没想到这座地下墓地里居然有那种湖泊存在。: To think there'd be a lake so deep within these catacombs.
……不过，太好了，果然霍拉斯人还活着，还在我的身边。: What a relief. I knew that Horace was alive, and wouldn't stray far.
谢谢你，你是我们的恩人。: Thank you. We are both in your debt.
我很想郑重向你道谢，但是现在手上只有这种东西。: This hardly expresses my gratitude, but it'll have to do for now.
请收下吧，还有，愿你的旅途路上有火指引。: Please, take it. And may the flames guide your way.
我接着要朝那座湖泊前进。: I will soon head to the lake.
都已经这么努力找了，还找不到人，说不定他已经不在地下墓地了……: I've searched high and low, with no luck. Perhaps he's left the catacombs.
唉，霍拉斯，你到底人在哪里呢……: Oh, Horace. Where have you run off to?
……你该不会丢下我了吧？要是如此，也太残酷了……: Have you abandoned me? No, what a horrible thought...
噢，是你啊，好久不见。: Oh, I thought it might be you. Good to see you.
结果从那之后，我就再也没见过霍拉斯了。: I never managed to find Horace.
但我身上还有身为无火的余灰、探王者的使命，: But my duty must be done, even alone. As an unkindled Lordseeker.
不，应该说是为了那些孩子们，就算只剩下我孤身一人，也要完成使命。: For the children I knew, bless their souls.
……你一定也是如此吧？: We all have our reasons, don't we?
请收下这个吧，麻烦你做了件没意义的事，以此聊表心意。: Please, take this. Recompense for my foolish request.
……还有，我为你祈祷：愿你的旅途一路有火引导。: And also a token of protection. May the flames guide your way.
……噢，你是位坚强的人，居然孤身一人肩挑使命。: Ahh, you are brave indeed. To face your duty alone.
而我也想要效仿你。: I would do well to learn from you.
那么，就得拜托你安静沉眠了。: Then I shall put you to rest.
请赐予我们火的庇佑！: And may the flames watch over us!
只有我自己一个人……什么事……都办不到啊……: I was weak on my own...
……噢，是你啊。: Ahh, I thought it might be you.
把艾尔德利奇……那个吃人的恶魔杀掉吧。: Help me vanquish Aldrich, the man-eating fiend.
多亏有你，真的非常谢谢你。: I owe this to you. Thank you. Truly.
噢，霍拉斯，我们成功了啊……: Horace, we've done it, we really have...
我是亞斯特拉的安里，是无火的余灰，可能你也是吧。: I'm Anri of Astora. Unkindled, like you.
我们正朝着教堂──那个令人不快的艾尔德利奇的故乡前进。: We seek the cathedral, home of the grim Aldrich.
我是亞斯特拉的安里，之前在活祭品之路的途中和你见过面。: We spoke before on the road of sacrifices. Anri of Astora.
人平安就好。: I am well pleased to see you safe.
没想到这座地下墓地里，居然有那种湖泊存在。: To think there'd be a lake so deep within these catacombs.
……还有，我为你祈祷：愿你的旅途路上有火指引。: And also a token of protection. May the flames guide your way.
我是卡塔利纳的骑士，: I am a knight of Catarina.
好不容易才查到这座教堂的宝库，: I've managed to track down this cathedral's store of treasure.
宝库就在那条羊肠小道的尽头。: It's right over there, across that narrow part.
不过，这该怎么过去才好？: Treasure...hmm. Always so close, yet so far...
所以才在这里困扰。: I'm in quite a pickle, indeed...
啊，你也先不要靠近那边喔。: Just hold your horses a moment.
说起来，的确可能会有不得了的宝藏……: I know, I know, treasure is so sorely tempting...
卑鄙的家伙！你还好意思活着喔！: How dare you! Have you no shame!
呃，嗨，我们是第一次见面吧？: Oh, yes, oh, hello, I don't believe we've met.
找我有什么事吗？: Do you have business with me?
……呃，哦，是喔……我想起来了。: Ah, oh, yes, of course...It's coming back to me, now.
哎呀，真是抱歉，与其说那是我做的，对了，不如说是那副铠甲干的好事。: Oh, I am so sorry. That was my hand, as you know, but the deed, well, that was the armour's doing.
如你所见，我也已经脱下来，有在反省啦。: Regrettable, truly. But behold, I'm stripped clean of that unruly attire.
而且呢，幸好你平安无事。: And look at you, not a scratch!
那就不算数吧。: All's well that ends well, right?
对，不算数、不算数，全部都是诅咒的错。: Yes, we'll be fine, I can tell, it's that rotten curse, it is, the untidy mess.
嗯，是啦，就算不是我做的，我还是要有所表示。: Oh, ahh, yes, now, it wasn't me, but you still deserve an apology.
这是一点心意，你就收下吧。: Just a little trinket. Go ahead, it's yours now.
还有呢，我其实是个行脚商人。: You should know, I'm a kind of traveling merchant.
既然你是无火的余灰，一定有些需求吧？: If you're as Unkindled as you look, you'll find plenty of good stuff.
哦，是你啊，需要什么吗？: Oh, yes, yes, what can I do?
我挑货的眼光很对你的胃吧？: Can't resist it, can you? My sumptuous selection.
哦，是你啊，欢迎光临帕奇老店。: Oh, hello again. Welcome to Patches' boutique of wonders.
真受不了你这没眼光的家伙……: Well, you could try looking a little harder...
……哦，毕竟我们第一次见面嘛，很正常。: Of course not, we have just met, after all.
抱歉啊，讲了一些奇怪的话，忘掉它吧。: Sorry, I've been a bit on edge. Forget I even asked.
不过呢，你很走运咧。: Ahh, but this is your lucky day.
其实呢，我是个小小有名的行脚商人。: I happen to be a world-renowned travelling merchant.
但是你得注意了，好奇心可以杀死一只猫。: Be more careful! By the gods, curiosity is going to kill you kittens.
这世间还是有不该接近的事物。: Some places are better left alone, you know.
