不过，我这忠告给得有点晚了吧？: Oh, sorry, am I a tad too late?
你就早点放弃，乖乖待在那等着被榨干吧。: Have no fear, there's beauty in death.
四周都是女人，这可是男人的心愿啊？: Besides, you're surrounded by ladies. Every man's dream, right?
四周都是你的同族，这样就不会寂寞了吧？: Besides, you're amongst your own. Plenty of company, right?
四周都是女人，反正你这烂秃驴最爱这套吧？: Besides, you're surrounded by ladies. Every rotten cleric's dream, right?
哦，之后的事你不用担心，: Oh, no matter, I'll look after things.
你尸体上的所有东西，我都会扒得精光！: By stripping every last trinket off your corpse.
敬请多加爱顾帕奇老店。: You're going to make some lucky customer very happy!
啊，先冷静下来听我说几句话吧。: Now, hold your horses, let's have a nice talk about this.
说实在的，是我不对。不过，我不是故意的。: I'll come clean, I did you wrong. I didn't mean it, though, not one bit.
只不过有一点……该说是一时鬼迷心窍吧……因为我是做这种生意的啊……: You get these...urges...running the business and all...Oh, and I hate myself for it, I do.
对不对？你也可以理解吧？这事常有啊，就原谅我吧。: You know what I mean? Terrible, really. But I can see you'll forgive me.
只要你还活着，这事情就不算数啊，对不对？: You're alive, after all, and that's what counts, right?
是吗，太好了！你愿意原谅我啊！: Oh, fantastic! A wily second chance!
哎呀，你果然是个讲理的人啊。: I knew you'd understand, I just knew it.
哎呀，果然了不起。这我可学不来呀，今后再一起奋斗吧。: The heart of a lion. A model for the rest of us. A true friend, forever.
怎么这样？喂，开玩笑也要适可而止啊。: Oh, for heaven's sake, no need to jest with a face like that.
你不是还活得好好的，而且我也道过歉了啊？: You're still alive, and I'm here grovelling in the dirt, so to speak.
对了！这是我一点心意啦。你看，我的诚意到了吧？: Oh, I know! Here, a token of my sincerity. Right and proper, eh?
既然我们同是孤独同伴，今后也一起奋斗吧！: We're just a couple of outcasts, let's make the best of it!
话说回来，好险当初有原谅我，对吧？: Aren't you glad we made good of things?
哦，是你啊。欢迎光临帕奇老店。: Oh, hello again. Welcome to Patches' boutique of wonders.
哦，是你啊，你这男人真是好运。: Well, look at you. The luckiest man in the world.
哦，是你啊，你这女人真是好运。: Well, look at you. The luckiest lass in the world.
我最近正好进了个不得了的宝物，如果你要买，我就便宜卖吧。: I just got hold of some truly fine treasure. And for you, I'll practically give it away.
如何？很不得了吧？: What do you say? Brilliant stuff, eh?
快感谢一下本大爷吧。: I won't ask for thanks, but I certainly deserve it.
……喂喂，你该不会不买吧？真吝啬。: Now, just wait, that's the best you can do? Bloody hell.
穷会穷成习惯耶，要懂得适可而止啊……真是的……: Yeah, keep those purse strings nice and tight. So tight they choke you.
喂，听说你认识葛雷瑞特。: Ahh, I see you've met Greirat.
……我以前在洛斯里克大牢里，受过那个鼠老头照顾。: The slinking rodent. But he did me a good turn back in Lothric dungeon.
现在是没什么脸去见他，唉，毕竟我还欠了无聊人情。: Doubtless I should do something about that little debt, or...maybe not.
不过他应该还是老样子，人还是很硬朗，对吧？: Well, I can hardly believe he's still standing.
喂，我问你，葛雷瑞特他怎么了？: Hey, what happened to Greirat, anyhow?
最近都没看到他的人影……: I haven't seen him at all lately.
你如果知道那个鼠老头上哪儿去了，告诉我吧。: If you know where he's scurried off to, be sure and tell me.
……没啦，要是他曝死荒野，还可以顺便补充我的货源啊。: I need to stock up, and if he's gone and croaked, he'll have left a gold mine.
哦，没想到是那个伊鲁席尔……: What? Gone all the way to Irithyll, has he?
什么冷冽谷的都城，那不过是历史的遗物。: Well, there can't be much left of that frozen sprawl.
真是的，那个疯癫的老头……: The old rat, he's gone off the deep end this time...
真是个疯癫的老头……: The old rat, he's gone off the deep end this time...
哦，偏偏是那个不归的洛斯里克……: Hmph. Off to Lothric, the castle of no return...
错估自己的能力到这种地步，小偷葛雷瑞特也老了啊。: That old thief's lost it if he thinks he has a chance in there.
早就不是菜鸟了，兴奋个什么劲啊……: It's not like he's new to this game, what's gotten into him?
真是的，小偷葛雷瑞特也老了啊……: That old thief, he's really lost it this time...
……哦，这样啊。: Right, yes, I see how it is.
我知道了，就算你在说谎，也就算了，: Some things can't be divulged. Even between friends.
看在我们的交情上嘛。: It comes with the territory, I know.
不过要是你想起来了，就告诉我吧。: But if you happen to recall any details, do be a saint.
这也是为了你最喜爱的帕奇老店好啊。: Do it for old Patch's boutique of wonders, at least.
怎么了？刚好想起来了吗？: Well? Happen to recall anything important?
那个鼠老头上哪儿去了？: About where that old rat scurried off to.
原谅我啦！我这不是道歉了吗！: Forgive me! I'm on my hands and knees!
不算数！不算数！: All's well that ends well, right!
不算数！不算数啊！: Oh come on, you know it's true!
我名为不屈不挠，决不屈服！: I'm Unbreakable Patches, nobody can crack me!
浑蛋，我可是……: Gods' piss, just my bloody luck...
我究竟，做了什么……: What did I ever do, anyway?
好了，忏悔的时间到啦。: Cough 'em up, every last one of 'em.
快住手！住手啊！: Stop this! Stop this at once!
可恶，你果然不对劲。: Gods' spit, I knew something was wrong!
浑蛋……你是怎么搞的……: Gods' spit and piss and blood...
抱歉，我想得太入神了。: Pardon me. I was absorbed in thought.
老实说，我正有点困扰。: To be honest, I'm in a bit of a pickle.
你有没有在靠近白桦树时，被大弓射箭攻击过？: Have you ever walked near a white birch, only to be struck by a great arrow?
看样子，攻击是从这座塔上面来的。: Well, if I'm not mistaken, they come from this tower.
虽然不晓得是谁，但我认为好好沟通过就会没事。: Whoever it is, I'm sure I can talk some sense into them.
我想上塔，却找不到方法上去。: But I have to find a way up, and that's just the trouble.
……而且这个升降机只能往下啊……: This lift only goes down, you see, and...
该怎么好呢……真伤脑筋……: Well, that doesn't get me anywhere...
……这个升降机只能往下……: This lift only goes down, but you know...
上下拉动看看的话，应该可以……不对、不对……: With a little warming up, eventually... No, no...
你是刚刚那位……没看见你的人，让我担心了一下呢。: Don't disappear like that. You had me downright worried.
多亏有你，我得到了上天的启示，: But thanks to you, an epiphany has struck me square in the head.
终于漂亮解开了这座升降梯的运作方式了！: I've unravelled the riddle of this inscrutable lift!
不过呢，世上总是会有些奇妙的事啊。: On some days, I begin to doubt myself.
我明明是上塔，回神过来却到了这里。: I went up the tower, so I thought, then somehow ended up here.
到底怎么回事啊……: I'm not exactly sure what happened.
……况且，你也看到那个庞然大物了吧？: Anyhow, do you see that? That humungous beast.
我算是老手，也决不会胆怯，但却一直在想该怎么办才好。: I'm no coward, and I've a steady hand, but that thing makes my skin crawl.
你可不要轻易动手喔。: Now, now, think twice before you go down that road.
那个庞然大物听得进别人的话吗……: I could try talking some sense into him...
……不太可能吧，看他怒上心头。: No, I think not. He's far too over-heated.
卡塔利纳骑士杰克巴尔多，前来助阵！: I, Siegward of the Knights of Catarina, fight by your side!
不过，千万别胡来了。: But you mustn't get in over your head.
你也是无火的余灰，必然身负着使命。: We Unkindled must put our duties first.
……不过，先干一杯庆祝一下。: But for the moment, we've a toast to make.
愿你的勇气、我的剑，以及我们的胜利: To your valour, my sword, and our victory together.
好了，我去小睡一下。: Well, I'm going to have myself a little nap.
庆功宴之后，一定要这么做啊。: The only thing to do, really, after a nice toast.
听这声音，是你啊，好久不见了！: I know that voice. Just how long has it been!
说起来很是丢脸，我居然被人谋算了。: I'm loathe to admit it, but I've been had.
你有没有看到我的铠甲？: Did you happen to see it anywhere?
感激不尽！我──卡塔利纳的杰克巴尔多，向你致谢。: My deepest gratitude! I, Siegward of Catarina, salute you.
只要有这副铠甲，一会儿我就能自行脱逃。: With my trusty suit of armour, I'll be out of here in a jiffy.
劳您费心了。: No need to worry about me.
再会吧，吾友！: Until we meet again, my good friend!
不过，这也是不得已。我再思考、思考，等待佳机吧。: Not to worry. Great planning begets great fortune.
这是卡塔利纳骑士的作法。: An old tenet of the Knights of Catarina.
一定会让我想到好方法的。: And I am a master planner, I do say!
但这可不太妙……: I'm in quite a pickle indeed.
就算是要自己打造……: Maybe I can fashion a replacement...from the...hmm
抱歉，我也真是的，居然打瞌睡起来了。: Excuse me. I must have dozed off.
话说回来，好久不见了。很高兴能够再相会。: Well, well, hasn't it been all too long! It's good to see you.
之前那件事，我还没能正式答谢你呢。: Oh, I seemed to have missed my chance, so...
我──卡塔利纳的杰克巴尔多，再次向你致谢。: I, Siegward of Catarina, offer my deepest gratitude.
这是我的一点心意，请万勿推辞。: And a little surprise to go with it. It's all yours.
对了，要不要共进一餐？: I know. Won't you join me for dinner?
杰克巴尔多的特制原素汤正好起锅。: I make a fine estus soup. I've got some stewing right now.
不死人偶尔模仿别人一下也不错啊，: Even we Undead deserve a little normalcy, from time to time.
让我们为这个重逢干一杯吧。: And finally, upon this rendezvous, let us make a toast.
愿你的勇气、我的剑，以及各自的使命: To your valour, my sword, and our sworn duties!
这座城镇──伊鲁席尔的某处，有座位在深处的地下监牢，: Somewhere, hidden right here in Irithyll, is a deep dungeon.
据说在地下监牢的下方，沈眠着罪业之都。: And even below that, the Profaned Capital.
……那是孤独的巨人王──尤姆的故乡。: Home of Yhorm, the reclusive giant lord.
承诺总是令人烦恼……: That reminds me, I've a grave promise to keep...
啊啊，抱歉，气氛沉重了点。: Oh, sorry, I'm afraid I've cast a cloud over things.
……好了，我去小睡一下。: Well, I'm going to have myself a little nap.
是你啊，抱歉。我想得太入神了。: Pardon me. I was absorbed in thought.
如你所见，我莫名其妙被关住了。: Look at me, trapped like a rat.
我坐在这想了很久了，: I've just been sitting here, weighing my options.
……而且，我恐怕另外需要点时间。: ...I just need a bit more time.
嗯……不好解决……: Hmm... A riddle for the ages...
没想到又被你搭救了。: Once again, you are my valiant saviour.
我──卡塔利纳的杰克巴尔多，向你致上最高谢意。: I, Siegward of Catarina, express my deepest gratitude.
这是我的一点心意，拜托你务必收下。: Take this, a token of my thanks. Go on, it's all yours.
……嗯，你请先行一步吧。: Ah, no, please, go on ahead.
我马上就会动身。: I've my own road to take.
……这次必然下定完成使命的决心。: And a duty to fulfil, very soon...
老是让你救我一命啊。: It seems I'm in your debt once again.
但是，谢谢你。多亏有你，我才能实践承诺。: My thanks, I could not have kept my promise without you.
愿你的勇气与使命，以及我的老朋友尤姆: To your valour, and my old friend Yhorm.
吾友啊……愿你平安达成使命。: You are a true friend. Best of luck with your duty.
你是什么意思！: What is the meaning of this!
不得已了，我无法手下留情。: No sense in holding back now.
好好见识卡塔利纳骑士的实力吧！: Witness the fury of a Knight of Catarina!
我……居然会在这里……: How did I ever let this happen...
你找错对手了啊……: You were a poor match, friend...
汝也放松休息便可……: But you may rest here, too, if you like.
哦，吾已等待许久，无火的余灰啊。: Ahh, the wait has been long, Unkindled One.
吾名艾玛，为这座城──洛斯里克的主祭。: I am Emma, High Priestess of Lothric Castle.
薪王们已从此城离去，: You will not find the Lords of Cinder here.
前去此城的基层，那漂泊而至，生根、曾经的故乡。: To their churning homes, converging at the base of this castle.
……汝当前往高墙下方。: Head to the bottom of the High Wall.
此小环旗将引领汝穿越大城门。: Forge on through the great gate, and raise this banner to proceed.
无火的余灰啊，汝当前往高墙下方。: Unkindled One. Head to the High Wall's base.
交付于汝的小环旗，势必引领汝穿越大城门。: Go through the great gate, and raise this banner to proceed.
而汝当谨慎，大城门有看门狗坐镇。: But beware. The dog keeps a close eye on things.
其为极度不祥，冷冽谷的看门狗……: The vile watchdog of the Boreal Valley.
汝身为探王者，该当前往高墙下方，找寻薪王们。: Are you not a Lordseeker? Head to the base of the High Wall and seek the Lords of Cinder.
此为亘古不变，并为汝之使命吧？: Is this not the calling of your kind, since ages past?
让他登上王位……: Tell him what he must be. A Lord...
……予汝此物，以作饯别礼。: This farewell gift is for you.
此为古老誓约之图纹。: It is the insignia of an old covenant.
汝若心忧侵入者，亦即强夺余火之暗灵，: If you fear tresspassers, dark spirits drawn by the embers.
则汝需谨记，: Then etch this upon your heart.
汝当以古老誓约，唤来青之守护者以狩猎暗灵。: And the old concord will beckon noble Blue Sentinels to hunt these foul spirits.
在哪？汝在哪？: Where have you gone? Are you hiding from me?
快快现身，毋须恐惧。: Come out, come out, don't be afraid.
汝为龙之子，受尽恩惠而生。: You were born a child of dragons, what could you possibly fear?
愚蠢之人，亲身尝尝吧，: Ignorant slaves, how quickly you forget.
何谓吾之爱子欧赛罗特、龙之子的力量。: The strength of dear Ocelotte, child of dragons!
孙子的笼子放不了。: So the grandson carries a cage
谁能进这笼子来，替代婆婆进笼来。: So come into the cage, and become nana's shade
……哦哦，您是无火的余灰啊。: Oh, my, I see you're Unkindled
没想到能巡礼之旅的终点、等待死亡之地，遇上此等际会。: For a pilgrim such as I, all tucked in and awaiting death, to have this honour.
我的死必定会受到祝福吧。: This presages a most glorious death indeed.
不过，还请您再稍待片刻，: But I'm afraid we require more time.
只需等待黑暗水滴垂落的片刻时间即可。: As long as it takes a dark droplet to fall, that is all.
您的伴侣就在前方……您马上会看到。: Your spouse awaits you, you are very near.
请拿起这把定约剑。: Please, take the Sword of Avowal.
并请您成为我辈隆道尔，真正的王吧。: May you be the truest Lord of Londor yet.
请您成为我辈隆道尔，真正的王吧。: May you be the truest Lord of Londor yet.
居然有个正常人掉进游魂的穴屋啊。: This pit is for Hollows, not for the likes of you sane folk.
还是说，你只是很会演戏罢了？: Or perhaps you are a Hollow, posing as otherwise?
是吗，是吗，我想也是。: Yes, yes, then we're just fine.
能明白这点，你还算是正常啦。: It's important to know who you are.
……不过，人总有一天会发狂，死不成的家伙更是如此。: But we'll all be mad, soon enough. And should you be Undead, well, all the more so.
狂人都是这么说的啦。: That's what you mad fools always say.
……是啊，人总有一天会发狂，死不成的家伙更是如此。: But we'll all be mad, soon enough. And should you be Undead, well, all the more so.
神的枷锁，意外地脆弱啊……: Beware, the shackles of the Gods are fragile.
所以你拿着吧，一点礼物。当你有一天发狂了，好好记着吧，: You might need this. Etch it on your heart if you feel your sanity slipping.
就来到这里，靠牺牲累积缘分吧。: Come here to pile up your victims, for that will form your anchor.
……等你发狂了就会明白，那时候我们就是一家人啦。: You'll see when you go mad. They'll be your family.
……虽然说你有朝一日会发狂，但不是现在。: You'll go mad one day, but not today.
奉劝你一句，用这骨片回你的地盘去吧。: Take my advice. Use this bone, and leave this place.
这里是游魂的穴屋，是我这种狂人利用牺牲结缘的地方。: This pit is for Hollows, and for the occasional madman fond of piling up victims.
你也不愿意像我一样吧？: You've better things to do, I'd hope?
哦，你果然是游魂啊。: I knew it, I knew you were Hollow!
就和我成为一家人吧！: You can join my little family!
来吧，你也成为一员、成为我的家人吧……: Right, onto the pile with you. You're family now...
在崖边高举小环旗吧:
Peer over the cliff,
and hold up the banner
把水盆放在斩首骑士像上:
Place the basin at the statue
of the beheading knight
内有冶炼炉:
A transposing kiln
lies within the belly
靠近白树会降下巨人的箭矢:
Arrows of a giant rain down
beside the white birch
冥想为步向古龙的道路:
The path to the archdragons
lies through meditation
欲步向龙道者，勿敲响大钟:
To travel the Path of the Dragon,
do not ring the great bell
钟响后，将无人物能残存:
Nothing will remain
once the bell has tolled
熄灭三座火焰，通往狼血的门将为之敞开:
Extinguish three flames,
and open the door to Wolf's Blood
若想接近书籍，披上蜡吧: Wear wax before nearing the tome
未持有人偶者，不得通过结界:
Bring a doll
to be granted passage
即使断了，仍有用途: Even broken, it still has a use
只有风暴才能击倒大树:
Only a storm
can fell a Greatwood
若想打倒巨人，必须有风暴剑:
To vanquish a giant, bring
the sword that rules storms
身上没有原素瓶的话，\n回头去找比较保险:
It would be wise to turn back and search,
if you possess not an Estus Flask
穿梭营火间，总有一天能抵达洛斯里克:
The bonfire will deliver
thee to Lothric
若想治愈黑暗印记，就大闹防火女的坟墓吧:
To soothe the dark sigil,
pillage the Fire Keeper's grave

流放之人，被故乡放逐，曾仰望黑色的太阳:
This exile was chased from his homeland,
and haunted by a black sun.
表示整体能力高低的数值\n能使用灵魂升级:
Value indicating the general strength
of one's combined attributes.
Use souls to level up.
持有的灵魂总数\n灵魂的用途众多，角色死亡灵魂会留在原地:
Total souls in possession.
Souls have various uses,
but are left behind
at the spot of one's death.
升级所需的灵魂量\n能通过升级提高能力值:
Required number of souls to level up.
Leveling up raises an attribute.
这名角色累积的诅咒数\n若累积过多诅咒，将变成游魂:
The degree to which
this character is cursed.
The character will turn hollow
if the curse grows too severe.
决定血量高低的能力值\n也会影响对寒气的抵抗力:
Attribute governing HP.
Also governs resistance to frost.
决定精力高低的能力值\n也会影响对雷属性的防御力、出血抵抗力:
Attribute governing stamina.
Also governs resistance to
lightning and bleeding.
决定专注值高低的能力值\n也会影响法术的记忆空格数:
Attribute governing FP.
Also determines number of
attunement slots.
使用强力重量级武器的必需能力值\n会提高使用武器的攻击力\n也会影响火属性防御力:
Attribute required to wield powerful and
heavy weapons. Also governs resistance
to fire and improves attack strength.
使用难以操作武器的必需能力值\n会提高使用武器的攻击力、\n法术的咏唱速度，与坠:
Attribute required to wield advanced
weapons. Also improves attack strength,
reduces spellcasting time, and reduces
damage taken when falling.
决定物理防御力的能力值\n（其他能力值也会影响物理防御力）\n也会影响装备重量上:
Attribute governing physical defense,
though this is also affected by other
attributes. Also governs maximum
equip load and poison resistance.
使用魔法或咒术的必需能力值\n会提高使用魔法、咒术的威力\n（咒术的威力受智力与:
Attribute required to cast sorceries and
pyromancies. Increases spell potency.
(Pyromancy is affected by both faith
and intelligence.) Magic defense is
also calculated from this attribute.
使用奇迹或咒术的必需能力值\n会提高使用奇迹、咒术的威力\n（咒术的威力受到智力:
Attribute required to cast miracles and
pyromancies. Increases spell potency.
(Pyromancy is affected by both faith
and intelligence.) Dark defense is
also calculated from this attribute.
决定寻宝能力高低的能力值\n会提高使敌方出血、中毒的威力\n也会影响对咒死的抵抗:
Attribute governing item discovery.
Ups bleeding and poison capabilities.
Also governs resistance to curses.
生存的力量、生气\n若归零则会死亡\n使用原素瓶，或在营火处休息可以恢复:
One's mettle, or will to live.
Character dies when this reaches zero.
Use the Estus Flask,
or rest at a bonfire to replenish.
使用法术、战技，\n集中精神时不可或缺的力量\n使用原素灰瓶，或在营火处休息可以:
Required to use spells and Skills. 
Use the Ashen Estus Flask,
or rest at a bonfire to replenish.
进行各种行动时的力量\n行动时会减少，但会自动恢复:
Required for various actions.
Depletes when actions are taken,
but recovers automatically.
所装备的武器、防具的总重量\n重量越重，动作会越迟钝\n右侧的数值为可装备的重量:
Total weight of equipped weapons and
armor. Movement slows as load
increases. Exceed the rightmost number
and movement slows dramatically.
所装备的武器、防具总重量\n与可装备重量上限的比例\n数值越大，行动会越迟钝\n:
Calculated by dividing overall weight
of equipped armor and weapons by the
max equippable load. A greater value
results in slow movement. Over 100%
results in extremely slow movement.
可装备的武器、防具的重量上限值\n重量越重，动作会越迟钝\n若超过上限值，行动会:
Max weight value of equippable weapons
and armor. Movement slows as load
increases. Exceed this number and
movement slows dramatically.
装备在右手第1空格的武器攻击力:
Attack power of weapon equipped 
in right hand Slot 1
装备在右手第2空格的武器攻击力:
Attack power of weapon equipped 
in right hand Slot 2
装备在右手第3空格的武器攻击力:
Attack power of weapon equipped 
in right hand Slot 3
装备在左手第1空格的武器攻击力:
Attack power of weapon equipped 
in left hand Slot 1
装备在左手第2空格的武器攻击力:
Attack power of weapon equipped 
in left hand Slot 2
装备在左手第3空格的武器攻击力:
Attack power of weapon equipped 
in left hand Slot 3
角色对普通属性物理攻击的防御力:
Character's defense against
standard physical attacks
角色对打击属性物理攻击的防御力:
Character's defense against
striking physical attacks
角色对斩击属性物理攻击的防御力:
Character's defense against
slashing physical attacks
角色对突刺属性物理攻击的防御力:
Character's defense against
thrusting physical attacks
角色对各种毒性的抵抗力\n数值越高，则越不容易中毒:
Character's resistance to various
poisons. The higher this value, the
longer one can resist poisoning.
角色对出血的抵抗力\n数值越高，则越不容易出血:
Character's resistance to bleed effect.
The higher this value, the
longer one can resist bleeding.
角色对咒死的抵抗力\n数值越高，则越不容易被咒死:
Character's resistance to curse effect.
The higher this value, the
longer one can resist being cursed.
角色对寒气的抵抗力\n数值越高，则越不容易冻伤:
Character's resistance to frost.
The higher this value, the
longer one can resist frostbite.
能记忆的法术空格数量\n法术有魔法、咒术、奇迹，共三种:
Number of attunement slots for spells.
Spells take the form of sorceries,
pyromancies, and miracles.
打倒敌人后，从尸体发现道具的能力:
Governs likelihood of finding items
on the corpses of defeated foes
受到普通属性物理攻击时的防御力及减伤率\n防御力由角色本身的能力值计算\n减伤率:
Defense against and absorption of
standard physical damage. Defense is
calculated by character attributes, and
absorption is the combined value of all
equipped armor and additional effects.
受到打击属性物理攻击时的防御力及减伤率\n防御力由角色本身的能力值计算\n减伤率:
Defense against and absorption of
striking physical damage. Defense is
calculated by character attributes, and
absorption is the combined value of all
equipped armor and additional effects.
受到斩击属性物理攻击时的防御力及减伤率\n防御力由角色本身的能力值计算\n减伤率:
Defense against and absorption of
slashing physical damage. Defense is
calculated by character attributes, and
absorption is the combined value of all
equipped armor and additional effects.
受到突刺属性物理攻击时的防御力及减伤率\n防御力由角色本身的能力值计算\n减伤率:
Defense against and absorption of
thrusting physical damage. Defense is
calculated by character attributes, and
absorption is the combined value of all
equipped armor and additional effects.
受到魔力属性攻击时的防御力及减伤率\n防御力由角色本身的能力值计算\n减伤率由所:
Defense against and absorption of
magic damage. Defense is calculated
by character attributes, and absorption
is the combined value of all equipped
armor and additional effects.
受到火属性攻击时的防御力及减伤率\n防御力由角色本身的能力值计算\n减伤率由所有:
Defense against and absorption of
fire damage. Defense is calculated
by character attributes, and absorption
is the combined value of all equipped
armor and additional effects.
受到雷属性攻击时的防御力及减伤率\n防御力由角色本身的能力值计算\n减伤率由所有:
Defense against and absorption of
lightning damage. Defense is calculated
by character attributes, and absorption
is the combined value of all equipped
armor and additional effects.
受到暗属性攻击时的防御力及减伤率\n防御力由角色本身的能力值计算\n减伤率由所有:
Defense against and absorption of
dark damage. Defense is calculated
by character attributes, and absorption
is the combined value of all equipped
armor and additional effects.
对各种毒性的抵抗力\n数值越高，越不容易中毒\n防具耐久度由所有防具及追加效果总:
Combined total value of all equipped armor's resistance to various poisons.
The higher this value, the more difficult it is to become poisoned.
对出血的抵抗力\n数值越高，越不容易出血\n防具耐久度由所有防具及追加效果总和计:
Combined total value of all equipped armor's resistance to bleeding.
The higher this value, the more difficult it is to start bleeding.
对咒死的抵抗力\n数值越高，越不容易被咒死\n防具耐久度由所有防具及追加效果总和:
Combined total value of all equipped armor's resistance to curse effect.
The higher this value, the more difficult it is to become cursed.
对寒气的抵抗力\n数值越高，越不容易冻伤\n防具耐久度由所有防具及追加效果总和计:
Combined total value of all equipped armor's resistance to frostbite.
The higher this value, the more difficult it is to get frostbite.

随处可见的平民长相。\n但其实每个人都有些不对称的部分，\n有完美对称脸型的平民:
The oh-so-plain face of a commoner.
Everyone has imperfections, but a commoner
without flaws is a rare creature indeed.
犹如盘石般威严的北方战士长相。\n而“北方无年少，”\n恐怕就是因此而生的揶揄。:
The face of a warrior, as if hewn from
rock. It's been long whispered in jest
northerners are born weathered and old.
贵族般端正的脸庞，多生得金发碧眼。\n这也是没落的亚斯特拉\n得以连结辉煌过往的:
The features of a true blue blood.
Blue of eye and fair of hair, a little
reminder of Astora's former glory.
充满知性的纤细长相。\n但称为书生脸多有嘲笑的意思。:
Intelligent face with fine lines,
often ribbed for looking like a prentice.
阴森圣职之国卡利姆常见的长相。\n而称为“和尚，”多是对圣职的蔑称。:
The face of a cheerless cleric of Carim.
"Novice" is used as something of a
derogatory term for men of the cloth.
特征是大眼和大口，充满活力的脸型。\n呈现出卡塔利纳──\n美酒与讴歌国度的形象:
The large eyes and mouth give this face a
look of jubilation. From Catarina, known
for its zest for life and love of drink.
特征是细长眼睛和薄唇的异邦人脸型。\n据说会以“龙之异邦脸”来赞美。:
An uncommon face defined by its narrow
eyes and thin lips. Some praise it as
the visage of a true dragon.
与他人不同的畸形长相。丑脸。\n偏见会产生异端，而异端驰骋于大沼。:
A uniquely deformed face. Or perhaps
merely ugly. Prejudice births malcontents,
and malcontents swarm to the Great Swamp.
毫无生气，彷佛游魂般的长相。\n隆道尔是老人与游魂的国度。:
A lifeless face, almost that of a hollow.
Londor is a realm of those hollow and old.
据说偶尔会在民间出现的古代神明长相。\n不过这反而象征不吉利，\n彷佛有一天会被:
The features of the old gods, as if from
legend. They say children born like this
are fated to be taken to the Boreal Valley.
阴森圣职之国卡利姆常见的长相。\n而称为“尼姑，”多是对圣职的蔑称。:
The face of a cheerless cleric of Carim.
"Novice" is used as something of a
derogatory term for women of the cloth.
历经流浪而倒下的无名下级骑士。\n体力高，装备有坚硬的金属铠甲，\n能承受攻击。:
An obscure knight of poor renown who
collapsed roaming the land. Sturdy, owing
to high vitality and stout armor.
与战场共生、历经百战的佣兵。\n敏捷高，能灵活使用双曲剑。:
A mercenary and veteran of the
battlefield. High dexterity allows
masterful wielding of dual scimitars.
以强韧不屈闻名的北方战士后裔。 \n能以强大的力气挥舞沉重战斧。:
Descendant of northern warriors famed
for their brawn. Utilizes high strength
to wield a heavy battleaxe.
过去受命而旅行的传令者。\n装备有坚固的枪，\n能使用微幅恢复的奇迹。:
A former herald who journeyed to finish
a quest undertaken. Wields a sturdy spear
and employs a gentle restorative miracle.
一般小偷，成为亡命士兵的下场。\n备有专从背后使出致命一击的短刀，\n也能活用士:
A common thief and pitiful deserter.
Wields a dagger intended for backstabs
alongside a military-issue bow.
躲藏在暗处捕猎目标的刺客之一。\n备有突刺剑，且对魔法有所钻研。:
An assassin who stalks their prey from the
shadows. Favors sorceries in addition to thrusting swords.
为了研究而离开学院的孤独魔法师。\n智力高，能操纵灵魂魔法。:
A loner who left formal academia to pursue
further research. Commands soul sorceries
using high intelligence.
操纵火焰的咒术师。\n是从边境而来的旅人，\n也是能够挥舞手斧的战士。:
A pyromancer from a remote region who
manipulates flame. Also an adept close
combat warrior who wields a hand axe.
旅行的圣职，\n在旅途中力气用尽而倒下。\n信仰高，因此能使用各种奇迹。:
A travelling cleric who collapsed from
exhaustion. Channels high faith to cast
many and varied miracles.
出身不明的裸体人物。\n若不是生前就是十足的愚人，\n就是埋葬时被盗走一切，才会:
Naked and of unknown origin.
Either an unfathomable fool in life, or
was stripped of possessions upon burial.
没有任何陪葬品。: No sign of a burial gift or otherwise.
镶有红色宝石的老旧戒指， \n可提升血量上限。:
Ring set with a small red jewel.
Raises maximum HP.
温暖的祝福圣水。\n可完全恢复血量、治愈所有异常状态:
Warm, blessed holy water.
Fully restores HP and cures ailments.
清澈的祝福圣水。\n可完全恢复专注值。:
Pure, blessed holy water.
Fully restores FP.
装满特殊火药，增强威力的“火焰壶。”\n不合礼仪的供品。:
Firebomb charged with a special black powder.
An uncouth gift for the departed.
充满恶意的大量粪便。\n送给像粪便一样惹人厌的人。:
A malicious feast of dung pies.
For one as execrable as excrement.
制作火焰武器的强化素材。\n对战士来说，比单纯的宝石更实用。:
Material used to upgrade to fire weapons.
More appropriate for a warrior
than pretty trinkets.
一同安眠的无主灵魂。\n使用后便能获得大量灵魂。:
The sovereignless soul of one
who slept beside you.
Use to acquire many souls.
联机游玩专用道具。\n仅能使用一次，\n化为暗灵入侵其他世界。:
Online play item. One use only.
Become a dark spirit and invade another world.
尚还幼嫩的白皮树枝。\n似乎是友谊的证明。\n蕴藏仅能使用一次的变身魔法。:
Branch of a young white birch, perhaps
an offering of peace. Can be used to
blend into environment, but only once.
为死者祈求幸运的陪葬品。\n能暂时提高寻宝能力。:
Burial item for good fortune after death.
Greatly increases item discovery
for a short while.

14. DISPUTE RESOLUTION/BINDING ARBITRATION/CLASS ACTION WAIVER.
14.1. YOU AND BNEA AGREE TO RESOLVE ALL DISPUTES AND CLAIMS BETWEEN YOU AND BNEA IN INDIVIDUAL BINDING ARBITRATION.  THAT INCLUDES, BUT IS NOT LIMITED TO, ANY CLAIMS ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO: (A) ANY ASPECT OF THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN YOU AND BNEA; (B) THIS EULA; OR (C) YOUR ACCESS TO AND USE OF THE GAME.  IT APPLIES REGARDLESS OF WHETHER SUCH CLAIMS ARE BASED IN CONTRACT, TORT, STATUTE, FRAUD, UNFAIR COMPETITION, MISREPRESENTATION, OR ANY OTHER LEGAL THEORY.
14.2. However, this Section does not apply to the following types of claims or disputes, which you or BNEA may bring in any court with jurisdiction: (i) claims of infringement or other misuse of intellectual property rights, including such claims seeking injunctive relief; and (ii) claims related to or arising from any alleged unauthorized use, piracy, or theft.
14.3. This Section does not prevent you from bringing your dispute to the attention of any federal, state, or local government agencies that can, if the law allows, seek relief from BNEA for you.
14.4. An arbitration is a proceeding before a neutral arbitrator, instead of before a judge or jury. Arbitration is less formal than a lawsuit in court and provides more limited discovery.  It follows different rules than court proceedings and is subject to very limited review by courts.  The arbitrator will issue a written decision and provide a statement of reasons if requested by either party.  YOU UNDERSTAND THAT YOU AND BNEA ARE GIVING UP THE RIGHT TO SUE IN COURT AND TO HAVE A TRIAL BEFORE A JUDGE OR JURY.
14.5. You and BNEA agree to make reasonable, good faith efforts to informally resolve any dispute before initiating arbitration.  A party who intends to seek arbitration must first send the other a written notice that describes the nature and basis of the claim or dispute and sets forth the relief sought.  If you and BNEA do not reach an agreement to resolve that claim or dispute within 30 days after the notice is received, you or BNEA may commence an arbitration.  Written notice to BNEA must be sent via postal mail to: ATTN: Legal & Business Affairs Department, BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment America Inc., 2051 Mission College Boulevard, Santa Clara, California 95054, USA. 
14.6. The Federal Arbitration Act applies to this Section.  The arbitration will be governed by the Commercial Arbitration Rules of the American Arbitration Association (“AAA”) and, where applicable, the AAA’s Supplementary Procedures for Consumer Related Disputes, both of which are available at http://www.adr.org.  The arbitrator is bound by the terms of this EULA. 
14.7. The AAA will administer the arbitration.  It may be conducted through the submission of documents, by phone, or in person in the country/region where you live or at another mutually agreed location. 
14.8. If you seek $10,000 or less, BNEA agrees to reimburse your filing fee and your share of the arbitration costs, including your share of arbitrator compensation, at the conclusion of the proceeding, unless the arbitrator determines your claims are frivolous or costs are unreasonable as determined by the arbitrator.  BNEA agrees not to seek its attorneys’ fees or costs in arbitration unless the arbitrator determines your claims are frivolous or costs are unreasonable as determined by the arbitrator.  If you seek more than $10,000, the arbitration costs, including arbitrator compensation, will be split between you and BNEA according to the AAA Commercial Arbitration Rules and the AAA’s Supplementary Procedures for Consumer Related Disputes, if applicable. 
14.9. YOU AND BNEA AGREE NOT TO BRING OR PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS OR REPRESENTATIVE ACTION, PRIVATE ATTORNEY GENERAL ACTION, OR COLLECTIVE ARBITRATION, EVEN IF AAA’s PROCEDURES OR RULES WOULD OTHERWISE ALLOW ONE.  THE ARBITRATOR MAY AWARD RELIEF ONLY IN FAVOR OF THE INDIVIDUAL PARTY SEEKING RELIEF AND ONLY TO THE EXTENT OF THAT PARTY’S INDIVIDUAL CLAIM.  You and BNEA also agree not to seek to combine any action or arbitration with any other action or arbitration without the consent of all parties to this EULA and all other actions or arbitrations.
14.10. If the agreement in this Section not to bring or participate in a class or representative action, private attorney general action, or collective arbitration should be found illegal or unenforceable, you and BNEA agree that it shall not be severable, that this entire Section shall be unenforceable, and any claim or dispute would be resolved in court and not in collective arbitration. 
14.11. Notwithstanding this Section, you have the right to litigate any dispute in small claims court, if all the requirements of the small claims court, including any limitations on jurisdiction and the amount at issue in the dispute, are satisfied. 
14.12. This Section shall apply to the maximum extent permitted by applicable law.  If the laws of your jurisdiction prohibit the application of some or all of the provisions of this Section, notwithstanding Section 16 (Governing Law), such provisions will not apply to you.

……你的身上，有股令人怀念的味道，: Ahh, thy scent beseems most familiar.
是股我们早已失去的香甜气味。: A sweet fragrance, long faded from our own bosoms.
……我不知道你是在哪里沾染上这股味道，: How this came to pass I know not, but...
但是你要小心，“安逸足以亡身”就是这么来的……: Take heed. Kindness can wear upon one's principles.
……啊，我辈之王啊，: Ahh, our Lord and rightful Liege.
……王啊，我不知道您是在哪里沾染上这股味道，: My Lord, how this came to pass I know not, but...
但是请您小心，因为“安逸足以亡身”啊……: Take heed. Kindness can wear upon one's principles...
那个女人以前曾是隆道尔的人，: It belongs to a woman from Londor.
倘若能化为游魂之王的粮食，一定也是如她所愿。: To provide succour for the Lord of Hollows surely would bring her much honour
……你要好好记住了，: In return, thou needst only do her a small kindness
那个女人和一群待在火焰阴影底下的人，共度到最后……: Remember those who stayed by her to the end, in the shadows cast by fire...
那是家姊的灵魂，: Twas the soul of my sister.
是成为灰烬，弃隆道尔于不顾的可悲女人──艾尔芙莉德的灵魂……: Elfriede... A poor wench turned to Ash, who would abandon Londor...
请将她化为王的粮食吧。: If thou wouldst, let it nourish thy Lordship.
……接着，请容我僭越，还望您能记得，: And in return, do her one small kindness.
家姊和一群待在火焰阴影底下的人，共度到最后的这件事。: Remember those who stayed by her to the end, in the shadows cast by fire...
……王啊，请您成为篡位者吧。: And lastly, my Lord, take up thy rightful mantle, of usurper.
……噢，女神啊，于世间无处容身的禁忌者之母啊，: Ahh, merciful goddess, mother of the Forlorn, who have no place to call their own...
请您看顾我等的觉悟。: Please, bear witness to our resolve...
请赐予艾雷德尔火焰、请赐予艾雷德尔火焰，: Fire for Ariandel... Fire for Ariandel...
赐予能燃起火焰的灰烬。: And the ash to kindle flame...
……有和那女的一样的味道……: You've the same scent as that woman...
对了，你是无火的余灰！我没说错吧？: Then you must be an Ashen One. You must be!
我一直在找你啊。: You don't know how long I've searched!
……哦，哦哦，很抱歉，我乱了方寸。: Ohh, ohh...don't mind me, didn't mean to fall apart.
我想要拜托无火的余灰，拜托你一件事: Now, Ashen One, I have a kindness to ask of you.
……有一个叫作艾雷德尔的寒冷国家，我们大小姐人就在那里，: My lady lives in the cold land of Ariandel.
想拜托你，让她看见火焰──: I need you to show her flame.
看见燃烧败坏事物的特殊火焰。: A proper flame, that will burn the rot away.
如果你身为灰烬，肯定会渴求火焰，对吧……？: If you truly are Ash, then it must be fire that you seek?
啊啊，谢谢你，这才配称作无火的余灰啊。: Ahh, thank you. They of Ash never fail.
这是艾雷德尔的绘画，是它破败的一角。: The painting of Ariandel. Well, rotted scrap of it, that is.
来，伸出你的手，触摸它吧……: Go on, take it, touch it...
……如此一来，灰烬就成双了。: And then, the Ashes were two.
……啊，你是说真的吗？: Oh. Are you certain of that?
怎么会、怎么会这样，灰烬竟然不渴求火焰……: Hogwash, hogwash. What Ash does not seek fire?
啊啊，我想也是啊，: Ahh, you again, I knew it.
如果你身为灰烬，还渴求火焰，就答应我的请求吧。: As any Ash seeks fire, you will surely help me!
有个叫作艾雷德尔的寒冷国家，我们大小姐人就在那里，: My lady lives in the cold land of Ariandel.
况且，这对你来说，也不是件坏事吧……: You will thank me when it's done...
拜托你了，快点住手……: I beg of you, please, stop.
我、我还有该去完成的事情……: My work is not yet done.
我不是你的敌人……所以，快点住手吧……: I am no foe of yours... Please, stop...
还是说，这就是灰烬的真面目吗……: Well, I suppose you are Ash...
原来是这样啊，这就是灰烬的真面目啊！: Yes, of course, as all Ash should be!
……如果你身为灰烬，一定会渴求火焰……: If you truly are Ash, you will seek fire...
……唉，你还真是过分啊……: Dear me, why would you do such a thing?
……不过碰上这种待遇，也是稀松平常的事情了。: No matter, it's hardly the first time.
这件事就算了，我有件事想要拜托无火的余灰，也就是你。: More importantly, I've a service to ask of you, Ashen One...
明明钟也没响，为什么闯进绘画里来了？: No bell tolls, and yet, you've slipped into the painting?
如果你不知道该往哪里去，想必芙莉德大人的金言能为你指路。: If you've lost your way, the words of Lady Friede will guide you.
来，往前走吧，好好地洗耳恭听。: Now, go on ahead. Show respect, and listen carefully.
来，进去里头吧，好好地洗耳恭听。: Now, go on inside. Show respect, and listen carefully.
怎么了？不要再拖延时间，往前走吧。: What's keeping you? Go on, straight ahead.
怎么了？不要再拖延时间，进去里头吧。: What's keeping you? Go on, right inside.
仔细听取芙莉德大人的金言就对了。: Show respect, and let Lady Friede speak to you.
……你听过芙莉德大人的指引了？: Lady Friede has spoken, has she not?
那么不须犹豫，快点离开吧。: Then tarry no longer and begone.
……啊，对了，我要警告你一件事。: There is one thing you should know.
在这寒冷的绘画里，好奇心过剩是要不得的事。: Inside the cold painting, curiosity could be your cross...
只要你一离开那干枯的火焰，就会在雪中迷失方向，横死路边吧。: Stray from the withering flame, and the snow will swallow you whole.
不是钟唤来的，到头来就只有这点本事吧。: You're nothing, without a bell to guide your way.
……是尤莉雅大人的游魂之王吧。: You're Lady Yuria's Lord of Hollows.
那么不须犹豫，快点离开吧: Then tarry no longer and begone.
……和尤莉雅大人，以及隆道尔一起走下去就对了。: Carry on, for Lady Yuria, and for Londor.
……物换星移，但历史依旧重演：: I've seen your kind, time and time again.
狂人自恃正义而捉拿逃亡者，揭露见不得光的事物，:
Every fleeing man must be caught. Every secret must be unearthed.
Such is the conceit of the self-proclaimed seeker of truth.
但是他们通常不会有所觉悟──: But in the end, you lack the stomach.
不知何时会降下报应……: For the agony that you'll bring upon yourself...
我身为您的骑士，竟然如此……: I swore an oath, but I have failed you...
你应该早就心知肚明了，: I trust you've learned your lesson...
在这寒冷的绘画里，好奇心过剩是要不得的事……: Inside the cold painting, curiosity could be your cross...
……你的身上有灰烬的味道呢……: I believe...I feel the scent of ash upon thee.
你一定是盖尔爷爷说的那个人吧……: Thou'rt the one of whom uncle Gael spoke.
可以让我看见火焰的那个人……: The one to show me flame.
……没关系，等我完成这个以后，我会就回去那边了……: Tis good. When this is done, may I return.
因为你把门打开了……: The door is open thanks to thee.
……没关系，因为我和盖尔爷爷约好了，: Tis good. I'll head off to paint.
所以要在那边画图……: I promised uncle Gael I would.
因为你答应盖尔爷爷的请求了……: Thou'st a pact made with uncle Gael.
所以我才想要告诉你。: So I wish to tell thee all.
……这幅画很大吧？我要把图画在这上面。: Behold its size. This is my canvas.
是一幅非常寒冷、黑暗，又很柔和的画: It's to be a cold, dark, and very gentle place.
……我想要画图。: I wish to paint a picture.
是一幅非常寒冷、黑暗，又很柔和的画，: Of a cold, dark, and very gentle place.
一幅总有一天，能成为某人容身之处的画: One day, it will make someone a goodly home.
……不明火焰者，不足以绘世；: Those who aren't ken to fire cannot paint a world.
受火诱引者，则不得绘世……: Those absorbed by fire, must not paint a world.
不用担心，妈妈，我没有忘记……: Don't worry, I haven't forgotten, Mother...
……我听见火的声音……: I can hear the fire crackle...
就快要看得见火了……: And soon, I will see it...
一幅非常寒冷、黑暗，又很柔和的画……: Of a cold, dark, and very gentle place.
总有一天，能成为某人容身之处的画。: So that it might make a home for someone, someday.
我就快要能看见火了……: I can almost see the flame.
之后盖尔爷爷就会拿颜料过来。: Soon uncle Gael will bring me the pigment.
不知道老爷爷有没有找到──: I wonder if he has found it?
不知道盖尔爷爷有没有找到──: I wonder if uncle Gael has found it?
因为我还要画出世界啊。: I have a world to paint.
……啊，你好像不是禁忌者啊……: Hmm, well, there's nothing forlorn about you.
那么，你该不会是另外一个灰烬吧？: You must be the other Ash, I suppose?
如果你是灰烬的话，拜托你，: Oh wondrous Ash, grant us our wish.
就像传说中描述的一样，烧了这个世界，: Make the tales true, and burn this world away.
让大小姐看见火焰吧。: My Lady must see flame, and you have only to show her.
而且，你们灰烬是渴求火焰的人，不是吗？: You are Ash, are you not? Is it not fire that you seek?
……你也看到了，这个世界已经败坏透了。: Surely you've seen. The rot that afflicts our world.
可是那个女的却骗倒神父大人，把火藏起来，: But that witch fooled the good Father, and buried the flame.
白费了我们的觉悟……: After we had all made up our minds, too.
……所以，拜托你了，: So, please, grant us one wish.
……喂，拜托你了。: Oh, please, it must be you.
我很怕啊，如果我一起慢慢败坏下去，: I'm so terribly frightened, of timidly rotting away...
不就变得和外面的家伙没两样了吗……: Like those... Like those fools on the outside.
我已经等好久了──: I've been very patient, you see.
传说中能够燃烧艾雷德尔: The tales tell of two Ashes, who'll burn Ariandel away.
那剩下来，成对的另一个灰烬啊……: And we need only one more...
如果你是另外一个灰烬就好了……: I was hoping you might be the other Ash, you see...
我在这里都能听见火的声音了，: I can hear the crackling from here.
那阵燃烧我们的故乡──艾雷德尔的绘画的声音。: The sound of my home, the painting of Ariandel, burning away...
……为了下一个世界，必须把这败坏的世界燃烧殆尽。: When the world rots, we set it afire. For the sake of the next world.
我们这么做，远比外面的家伙正派多了。: It's the one thing we do right, unlike those fools on the outside.
……啊啊，这才是燃烧世界的人啊。: Yes, of course, as a burner of worlds should...
欢迎来到艾雷德尔的绘画。: Welcome. To the painted world of Ariandel.
我是芙莉德，是与神父大人，以及禁忌者们共同携手度日的人。: I am Friede. I have long stood beside our blessed Father, and the rest of the Forlorn.
无火的余灰啊，我不清楚您为何会闯进绘画里，迷失方向。: Ashen One, I know not the missteps which led thee to this Painted World.
您身负使命，但使命与此处无关: But thy duty is all, and thy duty lieth elsewhere.
这房间里的营火，想必您看得到吧？: I presume it visible to thee? The bonfire here, in this room.
虽然它快要消逝了，还是足以引导您。: A meek and faded thing, but 'twill guide thee nonetheless.
……啊，让我送给您一件物品吧。: Ahh yes, there is a thing thou shouldst by rights possess.
虽然是迷路至此，但是我想送给如此相遇的您，关于这寒冷世界的回忆。: Ours is a chance encounter, to be sure, but perhaps it was meant to be.
请将它用于完成您的使命吧。: Let this be a remembrance of this cold world, a thing to help thee bear thy duty.
……好了，快点回到您该去的地方吧。: Now, return from whence thou cam'st.
有可以回去的地方，这是多么幸福的事情啊。: Thou'st a place in that world, and that alone is cause to rejoice.
……怎么了吗？您又迷失了吗？: What troubles thee to linger yet?
您并不是无处可回。: For that is thy place of belonging.
就算这个世界已经走向衰败的末路，: Should this world wither and rot,
艾雷德尔还是我们的故乡。: even then would Ariandel remain our home.
这里不需要您挂心，以一直以来的作法对待我们就可以了。: Sweep all thought of us from thy mind. As thy kind always have.
游魂之王啊，我不清楚您为何会闯进绘画里，迷失方向。: Lord of Hollows, I know not the missteps which led thee to this painted world.
我想送给身为隆道尔伟大王者的您，关于这寒冷世界的回忆。: A remembrance of this cold world, for the great Lord of Londor.
您已经是隆道尔的王了，有该领导的事物。: Thou'rt the Lord of Londor, and have thine own subjects to guide.
……神父大人，没有关系，还用不上鞭子，: Fret not father, we have no need of thy flail.
只是迷失至此的灰烬撼动了火焰而已。: Tis only the flame, quivering at misguided Ash.
我会马上处理掉灰烬。: I will snuff out these ashes for good.
像我这种人物，您为什么要为了我……: Such a deed, for one as I...?
……灰烬果真会渴求火焰啊……: As Ashes will be, ever seeking fire...
看得到火，还看得到细细微火……: I see flame. Flame, flickering, once again.
快点，快把鞭子拿来……: My flail... Bring me my flail.
啊啊，芙莉德，你有听到吧……: Ahh, Friede. What stops thine ears?
啊啊，你，你去叫芙莉德过来。: Ahh, oh. Bring Friede to me, please.
你也有看到吧？还有细细微火，: Canst thou not see? The flame, flickering once again.
感觉它都快要涌出来了……: Soon will it surge, I can see it, feel it...
所有的一切都化为火海吧……: Just let it burn, every bit of it...
“灰烬成双，则火燃起”: "When the Ashes are two, a flame alighteth."
灰烬，果然你啊，才配得上火焰……: Thou'rt Ash, and fire befits thee, of course...
我可爱的孩子啊……你在哪儿？: Where have you gone, sweet child...
外头很冷吧？很冷吧？: It's cold outside, so awfully cold...
你到哪里去了呢……: Where have you run off to?
可爱的孩子啊，我在这里唷，: I'm here, sweet child, right here.
外头很冷吧？你不可能找到容身之处──: You're cold, and you've no place to go.
因为你是我可爱的孩子啊。: You're mine, sweet child, all mine.
所以啊，孩子，快点回来吧，: So run home, sweet child, run home.
因为你是我可爱的孩子，不可能找得到容身之处。: You know, you've no place to go, you are mine, sweet child, all mine.
快点还给我！还给我！: What have you done with him! Give him back!
你把她藏起来了吧！你把我可爱的孩子藏到哪里去了！: Where have you hidden him? My dear, sweet child!
我不原谅你！你这小偷！: I'll get you! You rotten kidnapper!
……啊啊，你在哪儿？我可爱的孩子啊……: Ahh, where have you gone, sweet child...
……啊啊，芙莉德大人，所以才会这么温暖吧……: Ahh, Lady Friede, such is why it's warm...
真稀奇啊，好久没有新人了。: How very unusual. Just how long has it been!
我说你啊，开心点吧，这里正是我们禁忌者求之不得的安眠地──: Rejoice, my new friend! For this is a true haven of the Forlorn.
冰冷又温和的绘画世界──艾雷德尔。: The cold and gentle painted world of Ariandel.
……你也快点去找一找吧，: Quick, go along, find one for yourself.
哪里才是那甜美，带你步上衰败的摇篮啊……: A sweetly rotting bed to lie upon...
我们都一样，全都遭遇过惨事。: You're no exception. We've all seen terrible things.
所以没关系，你放心吧，: But you're safe now. Let it ease your burden.
在这艾雷德尔里头，一定会有让你安身的地方。: Ariandel will make a fine home for you.
……快吧，快去找吧，: Quick! Go along, find one for yourself.

尚未挑战至洛斯里克城的深处\n就不该挑战绘画:
Before one faces the painting,
one should face the depths of Lothric Castle
来，快给我──把你的黑暗灵魂给我。: Hand it over. That thing, your dark soul.
这就是黑暗灵魂的血吗？: The blood of the dark soul?
……灰烬啊，你带来的火正熊熊燃烧。: Ashen One, thy gift of flame has taken root
再过不久，盖尔爷爷就会拿颜料过来了──: And Uncle Gael will soon bring the pigment.
那带有人类黑暗灵魂色彩的颜料。: Pigment coloured like the dark soul of man.
带有人类黑暗灵魂色彩的颜料。: The pigment coloured like the dark soul of man...
这样我就可以画出世界了。: With this will I paint a world.
我想用你的名字替新的画题名。: I would name this painting after thee.
……谢谢，我会以那名字为主题，画出世界。: My thanks. I will paint a world of that name.
那会是一幅非常寒冷、黑暗，又很柔和的画……: Twill be a cold, dark, and very gentle place.
……我知道了，原来你也一样啊。: I see. We are much alike.
那这幅画，我以“灰烬”题名。: Then I will name this painting "Ash".
……盖尔爷爷不知道什么时候会回来？: I wonder when Uncle Gael intends his return.
如果新的画能成为他的容身之处，那就好了……: I hope the new painting will be to him a gentle home.
哦，看来你人还正常嘛。: Oh, look at you, you've got your head screwed on correct.
太好啦，没想到在这片聚集地里，也会遇见人。: Fantastic. To meet a kindred spirit, on this godsforsaken crag.
叫我拉普吧，因为真正的名字我已经忘了。: Call me Lapp. I can't remember my real name, so let's just go with that.
之后应该会有互相帮助的机会吧，到时候再多关照啦。: I have a feeling we're going to make a fabulous team. Oh, you'll see, you'll see!
啊，对了，先和你说一声可能比较好。: Ohh, in all honesty there's something I should tell you...
我其实是游魂。就算看起来很正常，其实以前的事全不记得了。: I'm...a Hollow. Yes, I try to play it off, but I haven't a clue about my past.
像我是谁，为了什么而活，还有真正的名字是什么，都不记得了……: Who I was, or what I lived for. Not even my own blessed name.
所以我一直在找，: That's why I've come here, searching.
在火出现时，找到黑暗灵魂的矮人，他们所在的城市──: For the Purging Monument, said to be in the Ringed City,
呃，因为啊，像解咒石那么小的石头，对我已经没有效啦。: All I can say is... Those little stones aren't doing much to help me remember anymore...
环印城，据说那里有解咒石碑。: where the pygmies, who found the Dark Soul at the dawn of fire, reside.
哎，反正就是这么一回事啦。: Well, that's the long and short of it.
如果我忘了你，你也不要怨我喔。: So, if I completely forget who you are, don't be wrath with me.
你也知道嘛，碰上游魂，你又能拿他怎么办？: C'mon, what else can I say? I'm a bloody Hollow, for heaven's sake.
哦，又碰见你了。: Oh, I know who you are.
看来你平安，这样就好。: Great to see you still in once piece.
话说回来，要说这里是末世之物的聚集地，还真有点样子: Cor, I can see why they call this the dreg-heap at the world's end.
……可以看到各个时代，各个地方的遗物。: ...Mangled remnants from every age, and every land...
所以我才会相信那个传说──: It actually sort of lends credence to the old rumours.
环印城就在这片聚集地的底层。: That the Ringed City rests below it all.
啊，抱歉，说起来这和你不相干吧。: Ah, don't mind me. You needn't worry yourself with this nonsense.
除了你以外，能攀谈的就只剩下背盖子婆婆，是我不自觉太多话了。: I just wanted to tell someone, and I'm sick of old humpty. I should stay quiet.
……算是表示歉意吧，让我告诉你一件好事。: Wait, I'll make it up to you, by letting you in on a secret of sorts.
再往前走，有座剧毒沼泽，里面有半沉没的巨大堆土塔残骸。: Past here, you'll find the remains of a giant earthen tower half-submerged in a poisonous swamp.
一般而言，有那种沼泽是该避开……不过沼泽的最深处，藏了个珍贵的宝物。: Not a very nice place to visit... Only, there's precious treasure in the thick of the swamp.
……那对我来说，已经是不必要的东西了，所以我就没特意去拿它，抱歉啦。: I didn't have any use for it, you see. So sorry, I left the whole package behind.
下次有机会的话，我会帮你去拿。如果你等不及，也可以自己先去。: If I get the chance, I could go fetch it for you, but if that's too long to wait, go nab it for yourself.
……我很清楚，你是名杰出的战士，应该也肩负使命。: ...I know who you are. A righteous warrior, yes? With a solemn duty, to boot.
把那宝物好好用在完成你的使命上吧。: Well, grab that treasure, that's as good a duty as any.
啊，对了，差点忘记告诉你，: Oh, wait, I forgot to give you a wee warning.
你要小心堆土塔里的暗灵喔。: Watch out for the Dark Spirit lurking at the earthen tower.
我是游魂，被那种东西攻击也不用担心，可是你就不一定了吧？: I'm hollow, so it won't bother me, but you're still human, I presume?
我也好想担心会被攻击喔。: Hmm, must be nice. Really, must be nice!
哦哦，你拿到宝物啦？: Ohh, look at you, you found the treasure.
太好了，它一定能帮到你的忙。: Dashing, just dashing. You'll make good use of it, I'm sure.
……这代表我一点敬意。: Now, this is a little toast, from me to you.
微薄心意不足挂齿，我们来举杯庆祝吧。你果然是很杰出的战士。: Not much to speak of, but bottoms up. To the greatest warrior there is.
哦哦，是你啊，来得正好。: Oh, there you are, perfect timing.
你还记得吗？我之前和你说过的，那个剧毒沼泽里的宝物: You remember that treasure, in the thick of the poison swamp?
……我依照约定，帮你把宝物拿来了。: Well, I fetched it for you, as promised.
没什么啦，顺手拿的而已，毕竟背盖子婆婆一直在啰唆嘛。: Oh, it was only a hop and a skip. I needed a rest from old nan over there.
来，拿去吧，要好好用在完成你的使命上喔。: Here, go ahead, it's yours. Maybe it'll help you with that solemn duty of yours.
不过话说回来，说这里是末世之物的聚集地，还真有点样子: This really is a dreg-heap at the world's end.
哦，是你啊，没想到会在这里碰见你。: Oh, well, fancy meeting you here.
分别往同一个目标前进，最后都平安抵达，这实在太开心啦。: A true blessing, that we should seek the same place, and find ourselves standing here, together.
我手上还有最后一批酒，来干一杯吧。: I've got the last of my brew. Let's have our own little toast with it.
祝我达成目的，祝你完成使命，再敬我们能再次碰面的幸运。: To my search, and to your duty. And to the joy that lies before us.
好啦，那我要去找解咒石碑在哪了。: Now, I'm off in search of the Purging Monument.
只要找到石碑，一定就可以回想起来──: Once I find it, everything will come back to me.
我到底是谁，为了什么而活，还有我真正的名字，: Who I was, what I lived for, what my name was.
再来就是，我到底一直在恨着什么: And... What terrible grudges I held.
……不知道为什么，我就是知道，我一定是这种男人。: ...I dunno, I just have this feeling. That that's the kind of man I was.
就算我真的是这种人，也请你不要讨厌我喔。: Oh, don't hold it against me, I only think I was!
只要找到石碑，我一定能回想起所有事情。: Once I find it, everything will come back to me.
哦哦，是你啊，又遇见你了。: Oh, and here we are again.
你那边情况如何？我这边不太乐观。: How goes things? I'm rather running in circles, I'm afraid.
我还是找不到解咒石碑，亏我一直找那么久了。: I can't find the Purging Monument. And I've searched high and low...
难不成打从一开始，石碑就不存在……: What if it was never here in the first place?
可恶，我到底该怎么办啊……: Ah, bloody hell, what do I know...
……抱歉，我没打算要这样烦你的……: Sorry, I know it doesn't concern you...
大概是看到你人没事，情绪稍微松懈了一下。: Seeing you all good and well, I...I just sort of spilled my guts to you.
拜托你像游魂一样，忘了我这丑态吧。: Just forget it all. Like a good Hollow would!
……我到底是为了什么，才一直找到这里来啊……: ...What did I come here in search of?
……我到底是为了什么……: ..Who am I? Why am I here?
啊，抱歉，你不可能对我说谎。: No, sorry, I know you'd never lie to me.
谢谢，谢谢你，我想马上动身去那里。: Thank you, thank you kindly. I'll speed right on over.
……我终于能想起来了──: ...It won't be long now, before I know everything.
我是什么人，为了什么而活，还有我真正的名字。: Who I was, what I lived for, and what my name was.
全多亏有你帮忙。: And I'll have you to thank for it all.
我以我真正的名字发誓，: I swear upon my birth name.
不论我想起什么，不论我是谁，我都会是你的朋友。: That I am your friend. No matter what might come out, no matter what I was.
只要你愿意，我会一直当你的朋友。: If you would do me the honour, allow me to be a true friend, always.
多亏有你，我才能找回我自己，这绝对要好好答谢你才行。: Now I know exactly who I was. And for that, I've a little thanks to be giving.
……这前面有个断掉的楼梯，你从那里往前看吧，有一堆很赞的宝物喔。: Go this way, and peep past the broken staircase. Some awfully fine treasure's just sitting there all alone.
……毕竟你这么照顾我，要我说几次都行。: I've much to thank you for, so I'll say it again and again.
这前面有个断掉的楼梯，你从那里往前看，会有一堆很赞的宝物喔。: Go this way, and peep past the broken staircase. Some awfully fine treasure's just sitting there all alone.
再怎么改朝换代，人类的欲望还是那副老样子。: Every age, it seems, is tainted by the greed of men.
这对无欲无求的我来说，真的很难理解耶。: Rubbish, to one such as I, devoid of all worldly wants!
……可能这才是人类该走的路吧。: Hmmm, I dunno, maybe it's just the way we are.
我会尽力帮你祈祷，希望你能拿到黑暗灵魂。: I'll stick you in my prayers. A fine dark soul, to you.
可恶，你已经失去神智了吗？: Bloody hell! Lost your mind, have you?
那我也别无选择，原谅我吧！: Then I have no choice! Forgive me!
这到底是怎么搞的啊……: Everything always goes to pot, doesn't it...
……请说出神的名讳。: Speak thee the name of God.
倘若您还记得，请告诉我。您所信仰的神明之名为何？: Thine own god, if thou canst recall.
我名为希拉，为侍奉教堂之长──费莲诺尔公主之人。: I am known as Shira, servant to the Princess Filianore, matriarch of the church.
既然您知晓神的名讳，也明白黑暗如何可畏，: They who are ken to God's name are surely ken to the terrors of the dark.
就请万万不得侵扰公主安眠──: Please, I bid thee take not from the Princess her peace or rest.
公主在火迈向终结时，位距黑暗咫尺之遥，也都是为了人类。: As the fire waneth, does she lie by the dark, all for the sake of Man.
我如此无能，又受困于此，您竟然还愿意和我交谈。: To speak to a captive such as I.
是因为您为人如此，才会记得神的名讳吗？: It is no surprise thou rememb'rest our God.
……我可以拜托您一件事情吗？: May I ask thee a kindness?
这座城市里有一只龙在此栖息，说不定您已经见过了。: Perhaps thou'st beheld the lone dragon that inhabiteth this city?
牠是古龙的后裔──米狄尔。: Midir is his name, and the Archdragons are his forebears.
那只龙吞噬黑暗，黑暗也因此侵蚀着牠。: He once railed against the dark, but was by dark afflicted. Now here, returned, he remaineth.
牠为了履行古老约定──守护公主的安眠，而回到这座城市。: To watch over the sleeping Princess, true to the old accord.
……我希望您打倒那只龙。: ...And yet, I would have thee put the dragon to rest.
赶在牠被黑暗侵蚀殆尽，完全遗忘约定之前打倒牠。: Afore the dark consumeth him, and his vows are forgot.
信神之人啊，感谢您。: I offer my sincerest gratitude, thou who art ken to God's name.
我拜托您的事十分过分，希望这物品多少能帮助到您。: I have asked a thing most terrible of thee. May this token of thanks be of aid.
拜托您，希望您能打倒那只龙。: I beg of thee, put the great dragon to rest.
在牠被黑暗吞噬殆尽，完全遗忘约定以前，打倒牠吧。: Afore the dark consumeth him, and his vows are forgot.
……说来也是正常。人类早在许久以前，就已不记得神明之名。: As I thought. Such memories were lost by thy kind, long ago.
这也正是人会渴求黑暗的原因。: And so it is ye...who yearn for darkness.
……我明白了，请您继续踏上旅程吧。: Very well. Then hasten on thy journey.
还有，千万不得侵扰公主的安眠──: Only, disturb not the sleeping Princess.
……您怎么了吗？: Carest thou to speak thy peace?
……米狄尔似乎掉进黑暗深谷里了。: So, Midir hath into the chasm fallen.
不过我还听得见牠的声音。直到现在，牠仍继续受到黑暗侵蚀。: Still, his voice I hear. The dark grieveth him yet.
拜托您了，请打倒牠吧。: I prithee, put him to rest.
在公主的教堂前方，有座祭祀众骑士的塔。: Just afore the church of the Princess standeth a tower, honouring ancient knights.
在一尊手无寸铁的骑士像后方，有一间小型礼拜堂隐藏其中，: There lieth a small shrine, behind the sculpted knight which beareth no arms.
应该可以从那里往下走，到达黑暗深谷。: Tis from there one may descend the chasm of darkness.
……我知道自己提了一个过分的请求，: I know, I have asked of thee a thing most terrible.
对不起，但是我只能拜托您了。: Forgive me, thou wert but mine only hope.
请您打倒牠，: I prithee, put the great dragon to rest.
在公主的教堂前方，有座祭祀众骑士的塔，其中有一尊手无寸铁的骑士像，: Just afore the church of the Princess standeth a tower built to honour ancient knights. Behind the sculpted knight which beareth no arms,
骑士像后方有一间小型礼拜堂，应该可以从那里往下走，到达黑暗深谷。: is a small shrine, from which one may descend the chasm of darkness.
那只龙能遵守约定，得以善终，全都多亏有您的帮助。: Tis thanks to thee the dragon erred not from his vows.
请收下，这是我能给您的最后一份谢礼了。: Please, take this. A final gift of thanks.
请您继续踏上旅程吧，还有，千万不得侵扰公主的安眠──: Now, hasten on thy journey, but wake not the slumbering Princess.
……啊！您成为教堂之枪了！: Oh! Thou'rt now a spear of the church!
这真是美事一桩。: What a wonderful, blessed day this is.
因为您成为枪之后，不论是公主的安眠，或是米狄尔的约定，全都无后顾之忧了。: With a spear such as thee, surely the Princess will slumber most gently, and Midir's vows will be honoured.
我身为侍奉她的人，身为牠的好友，向您致上谢意。: I must thank thee, as a servant of the Princess, and a dear friend to Midir.
愿您的旅途能继续满载荣光。: May thy travels be resplendent with glory.
火迈向终结，公主位距黑暗咫尺之遥──但还有您守护着她的安眠。: As the fire waneth, does she lie by the dark, but now with thee to shelter her sleep.
我十分感激教堂之枪，愿您的旅途能继续满载荣光。: Bless ye spears of the church. May thy travels be resplendent with glory.
……啊，您……成为圣枪了啊。: Ah, thou'st... A Divine Spear become!
那在神的时代，是英雄的称号。在火迈向终结时，照理说圣枪是不可能存在的。: An honour once bestowed in the time of the Gods, nearly unheard of in this age of waning fire.
我身为侍奉公主的人，身为米狄尔的好友，: As a servant of the Princess, and friend to Midir...
很庆幸自己能结识这么杰出的大人物……: I am honoured to have met thee.
我十分感激圣枪，愿您的旅途能继续满载荣光。: Bless ye divine spears. May thy travels be resplendent with glory.
找你很久了，沁染黑暗之人。: I've searched for thee, dark-stricken creature.
我希拉亦为神明后裔，公爵的女儿，以及米狄尔的好友。: I am Shira, daughter of the Duke, descendant of gods, and trusted friend to Midir.
我心中刻画着神明的荣耀，对火的骄傲，以及对黑暗的恐惧。: At once, I am the honour of the gods, the glory of fire, and the fear of the dark.
你们那些背叛、亵渎，还有卑贱的渴望！: For thy treachery, thy profanity, and thy shameless yearning!
我无法原谅你们。: Ne'er will I forgive thy kind.
你那曾身为枪的荣耀。: The great honour it was to be a spear.
为什么要向黑暗靠拢呢？: Art thou to bed with the dark?
不受火冀望的，比比皆是──: Many of us are by the fire forsaken.
你们人类不消说，我们亦是如此。: I speak of thine kind, and mine.
放眼看看这座城市吧！互为同道中人的事实，显而易见。: Behold this city! We are kindred, belike two eyes which gaze upon the other.
因此，你毋须畏惧黑暗，: Fear not, the dark, my friend.
有人以为知晓一切，挺身对抗黑暗；然直到最后，才理解自身无知。: One met the dark with learning. But in the end, learned his knowledge was wanting.
世界始于无知，而终也归于无──: The world began without knowledge, and without knowledge will it end.
这不是理所当然吗？: Dost not this ring clear and true?
那杀害血亲的可怜女孩也接受深渊的怀抱，融于其中──: One poor girl slew her own kin, but even so, was embraced, enveloped by the Abyss.
就是因为薄暮、月亮，都没办法给予她如此安稳的感受。: Twas a comfort that neither moon nor sunless sky afforded her before.
流浪骑士探寻禁忌，永无止尽地旅行，: One was a wayfaring knight, on an endless, forbidden search.
而他旅行的终点只能在深渊寻得──即使她不可能现身深渊，也是一样。: Only the Abyss granted closure, if not reunion with his beloved.
那女人怕得很──怕那栖身黑暗，不停咬啮、折磨她的虫子。: And so, she lived in fear. Of the dark, of the things that gnawed at her flesh.
但是那又如何！深渊里不会有那种东西！: And yet! The Abyss hath yet to produce any such creature!
那男人心怀恐惧──穿戴坚固铠甲，竟然会怕柔弱的女人，这是什么闹剧呢？: And so, despite his weighty armour, he lived in fear. Of a delicate thing, little more than a girl.
待在火旁，就会产生扭曲黑影──然而深渊不存在黑影。: Where fire resideth, shadows twist and shrivel. But in the Abyss, there are shadows none.
在那些指头里，只有那男人与深渊相融。: Of all the Fingers, he alone was embraced by the Abyss.
这也是因为他属于人族，并非蛆类。: For he was human, and ne'er a grub.
啊，没错，我想起来了。: Ahh, yes, yes, I remember now!
啊啊，毋须畏惧黑暗，: Search thine own self. Fear not the dark.
……哦，你神智还清楚吗？: Oh, your head's square on your shoulders, is it?
我以为就到铁块小鬼为止，怎么人又来了？: I thought that clamouring tin can was the last, but here we go again.
好吧，找我这背着盖子的老太婆做什么？: What is it you want from this old stone-humped hag?
……话先说明白，我什么都不会帮你。我只想待在这儿旁观。: I've nothing for you, not a smithereen. I just like to stand here, and take in the view.
你说这话还真是怪，: Well, that came out of nowhere.
背着盖子的老太婆哪有什么事让你好找？: You think an old stone-humped hag would be brimming with goodies?
……劝你不要过度期待啊。: I've none of that, not a smithereen.
到底有什么好感兴趣的……: What on earth do you see in me?
在火的时代落幕时，一切都会聚集到末世所在──: At the close of the Age of Fire, all lands meet at the end of the earth.
不论是王国也好，贫苦之地也罢，无一幸免。但说来，人世间就是这个样:
Great kingdoms and anaemic townships will be one and the same.
The great tide of human enterprise, all for naught.
……所以我才会喜欢这片景色。: That's why I'm so taken by this grand sight.
这不就是神明的作为吗？: This must be what it's like to be a god.
……啊，对，你要是好奇心过剩，就要小心了。: Oh, if you just can't stop yourself, at least hear this.
从这里更往下走，会有个巨大，阴暗的树洞: Far below, there's a deep, dark hole carved out of a tree.
……现在偶尔还会听见，从那树洞传来声音，: ...From time to time, voices brim from the depths of the cavity even now.
那是洛里安大人曾提及的，恶魔的声音。: Mutterings of the very demon that Prince Lorian spoke of, I'm sure.
是受疾病侵蚀，还不停诅咒人类──怪物的声音啊。: Horrible sounds, of an afflicted thing yet cursing men.
你从哪里听到那名字的？: Why, where did you hear that name, love?
……算了，哪里听到的都行。就告诉你，我老太婆知道些什么吧。: Oh, it doesn't matter. I'll tell you what I know.
根据传说，环印城位于末世所在，: The Ringed City is said to be at world's end.
我记得它在这片聚集地的前方，就在最深处的地方。: Past this heap of rubbish, as far as one can go.
环印城是神明为矮人们所造的流放地，是座围墙耸立的隔离城市: The forsaken Ringed City was walled off by the gods to contain the pygmies.
……黑暗灵魂也不是你该接近的东西啊。: ...and the dark soul is better left well alone...
……对，就像你猜的一样，: Ahh, yes, it's just what you'd guess.
根据传说，环印城就是末世所在，: Legend says that the Ringed City lies at the end of the earth.
它也正是末世之物聚集的地方。: This heap of everything, you're looking right at it.
环印城是矮人的流放地，黑暗灵魂也不是你该接近的东西啊。:
The pygmies were exiled to the Ringed City.
And no one should go near the dark soul.
……你还是要去，对吧？: You're not willing to reconsider, are you?
这样也好，使命也不是人人都有，: Well, that's just fine. It's a rare thing, to have a true duty.
你要好好珍惜。: Don't go and take it for granted, I suppose.
对你，还有对那铁块小鬼来说，这样最好吧。: Won't do any better than this, not you or that poor tin can.
你也要保持正常啊。: At least until I lose mine.
记得帮我转达给铁块小鬼啊，: When you see that tin can, pass the word along.
因为那小鬼看起来怪有自信的。: I'm afraid he's a little too brave for his own good.
你可别死了喔，: Don't run off and die, love.
我不想让我的景色变得更哀伤。: It's a nicer view with you in it.
……终于来迎接我了吗？: My time has come, has it?
希望我也能见到天使……: Well, maybe I'll get to see an angel.
嘿，我问你，你是那些家伙带来的？: Hark! They brought thee here, did they not?
你是神的使者？还是说，你只是做做样子罢了？: Dost thou the gods serve? Or merely that role affect?
说谎，睁眼说瞎话。你这种人哪可能是神的使者？: A lie, a wretched lie! How wouldst one such as thee do service to the gods?
况且你这种角色心里在盘算什么，我老早就知道了: Thy scheme is known to me, I know what it is thou desirest.
要不是这样，谁会想来这种鬼地方？: Why else wouldst one deign to visit this dung heap?
别装啦，我和你是一伙的啊。: Give rest to thy falsity, I would be an ally to thee.
我就说嘛，这就对了，你这种人哪可能是神的使者？: Yes, yes, of course. How wouldst one such as thee do service to the gods?
嘿，如果你想把黑暗灵魂拿到手，: If it is the dark soul thou desirest...
就去山崖底下的费莲诺尔教堂，: Then seek Filianore's church, at the base of the cliff.
那里有个公主，把她叫醒就对了。: There wilt thou the sleeping Princess waken.
那种狗屁手段，只是为了不让你接近黑暗灵魂罢了。: A lid covering an overgrown privy; a prop to keep thee from the dark soul of thine desire.
不用怀疑我啦，我和你是一伙的啊。: Worry not, I am a true friend to thee.
只要你是人类，就一定能感受得到──: If thou'rt yet human, the urge will soon begin to swell.
想把这诸神的鬼地方，搞得一团乱的冲动。: To curse the gods, and bring ruin upon this accursed heap of dung.
快去吧，去山崖底下的费莲诺尔教堂，叫醒公主吧。: Now, yarely to Filianore's church at the base of the cliff, to rouse the sleeping Princess.
如果你真的想拿到黑暗灵魂，就该这么做。: If thou yet the dark soul desirest...
被红头巾吃了……: The Red-hood is come to eat us...
……诸神啊，受深渊诅咒吧……: May the Abyss's curse take the gods....
拜访者啊，尽快转身离开。: Unknowing visitor, return from whence thou camest.
此刻尚未深入深渊，不论何等人物，皆不得打扰主人安眠。: The Abyss runneth deep. By the King's decree,
此为王法所令。: None may disturb our mistress's slumber.
竟敢目无王法，愚昧至极。: Foolishness. The King's decree is no trifling matter.
就由我阿尔戈法官祭下制裁。: I, Judicator Argo, shall deliver thee justice.
……教堂之枪啊，守护费莲诺尔公主的契约者啊，: ...Spear of the Church, sworn defender of our Princess Filianore!
倾听呼唤你的声音！: Harken to the call that summons thee!
教堂之枪啊，守护吾法之源，我们的公主……: Spear of the church, by the sacred decree, protect our Princess.
……教堂之枪啊，降临吧……: Spear of the Church, make haste...
教堂之枪啊，尽快转身离开。: Spear of the Church, turn back.
此刻尚未深入深渊，若惊扰吾等之主安眠，绝不得轻饶。: The Abyss runneth deep. Thou'rt sworn to protect our mistress's slumber.
此为背弃契约，以至上犯王法之举。: Or wouldst thou thy covenant forsake, in violation of the King's decree?
尽快转身离开吧，教堂之枪。: Turn back, Spear of the Church.
胆敢贱视契约，上犯王法，实在愚昧至极。: Foolishness. To forswear thy covenant and the King's decree.
我阿尔戈法官，将对不洁之枪祭下制裁。: I, Judicator Argo, shall bring this defiled spear to justice.
……古老圣枪啊，守护费莲诺尔公主的契约者啊，: ...Divine spear of Yore, sworn defender of our Princess Filianore!
古老圣枪啊，守护吾法之源，我们的公主……: Divine spear of yore, by sacred decree, protect our dear Princess...
……古老圣枪啊，降临吧……: Divine spear of yore, make haste...
